novice_mage.name: Novice mage
novice_mage.description: A young magic user, practicing simple spells.

filthy_street_urchin.name: Filthy street urchin
filthy_street_urchin.description: He looks squalid and thoroughly revolting.

scrawny_cat.name: Scrawny cat
scrawny_cat.description: A skinny little furball with sharp claws and a menacing look.

wild_rabbit.name: Wild rabbit
wild_rabbit.description: It is not a carnivore, but will defend itself if you stray tooclose.

woodsman.name: Woodsman
woodsman.description: He has an axe with a sharp and strong edge.

scruffy_little_dog.name: Scruffy little dog
scruffy_little_dog.description: A thin flea-ridden mutt, growling as you get close.

farmer_maggot.name: Farmer Maggot
farmer_maggot.description: Before you appears a broad thick-set hobbit with a round red face."What's wrong with old Maggot?" asked Pippin.  "He's a good friend toall the Brandybucks.  Of course he's a terror to trespassers, and keepsferocious dogs -- but after all, folk down here are near the border andhave to be more on their guard."

blubbering_idiot.name: Blubbering idiot
blubbering_idiot.description: He tends to blubber a lot.

hobo.name: Hobo
hobo.description: Ugly doesn't begin to describe him.

raving_lunatic.name: Raving lunatic
raving_lunatic.description: Drooling and comical, but then, what do you expect?

pitiful_looking_beggar.name: Pitiful looking beggar
pitiful_looking_beggar.description: You just can't help feeling sorry for him.

mangy_looking_leper.name: Mangy looking leper
mangy_looking_leper.description: You feel it isn't safe to touch him.

agent_of_black_market.name: Agent of black market
agent_of_black_market.description: He 'finds' new wares for the Black Market. From unwary adventurers...

singing_happy_drunk.name: Singing, happy drunk
singing_happy_drunk.description: He makes you glad to be sober.

aimless_looking_merchant.name: Aimless looking merchant
aimless_looking_merchant.description: The typical ponce around town, with purse jingling, and looking for moreamulets of adornment to buy.

mean_looking_mercenary.name: Mean looking mercenary
mean_looking_mercenary.description: No job is too low for him.

battle_scarred_veteran.name: Battle scarred veteran
battle_scarred_veteran.description: He doesn't take to strangers kindly.

martti_ihrasaari.name: Martti Ihrasaari
martti_ihrasaari.description: He weighs 127 kg. He is the former president of some remote country.

large_white_snake.name: Large white snake
large_white_snake.description: It is about eight feet long.

blinking_dot.name: Blinking dot
blinking_dot.description: Is it there or is it not?

giant_white_centipede.name: Giant white centipede
giant_white_centipede.description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

white_icky_thing.name: White icky thing
white_icky_thing.description: It is a smallish, slimy, icky creature.

clear_icky_thing.name: Clear icky thing
clear_icky_thing.description: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, blobby creature.

giant_white_mouse.name: Giant white mouse
giant_white_mouse.description: It is about three feet long with large teeth.

large_brown_snake.name: Large brown snake
large_brown_snake.description: It is about eight feet long.

small_kobold.name: Small kobold
small_kobold.description: It is a squat and ugly humanoid figure.

kobold.name: Kobold
kobold.description: It is a small, dog-headed humanoid.

white_worm_mass.name: White worm mass
white_worm_mass.description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

floating_eye.name: Floating eye
floating_eye.description: A disembodied eye, floating a few feet above the ground.

rock_lizard.name: Rock lizard
rock_lizard.description: It is a small lizard with a hardened hide.

jackal.name: Jackal
jackal.description: It is a yapping snarling dog, dangerous when in a pack.

soldier_ant.name: Soldier ant
soldier_ant.description: A large ant with powerful mandibles.

insect_swarm.name: Insect swarm
insect_swarm.description: A lone insect may be harmless, but there's a whole swarm ofthem here!

greater_hellbeast.name: Greater hell-beast
greater_hellbeast.description: This unholy abomination will crush you. Flee while you can!

blubbering_icky_thing.name: Blubbering icky thing
blubbering_icky_thing.description: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, hungry creature.

metallic_green_centipede.name: Metallic green centipede
metallic_green_centipede.description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

novice_priest_45.name: Novice priest
novice_priest_45.description: He is tripping over his priestly robes.

novice_mage_46.name: Novice mage
novice_mage_46.description: He is leaving behind a trail of dropped spell components.

white_jelly.name: White jelly
white_jelly.description: Its a large pile of white flesh.

giant_black_ant.name: Giant black ant
giant_black_ant.description: It is about three feet long.

salamander.name: Salamander
salamander.description: A small black and orange lizard.

white_harpy.name: White harpy
white_harpy.description: A flying, screeching bird with a woman's face.

grip_farmer_maggots_dog.name: Grip, Farmer Maggot's dog
grip_farmer_maggots_dog.description: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot.  It thinks you arestealing mushrooms.

wolf_farmer_maggots_dog.name: Wolf, Farmer Maggot's dog
wolf_farmer_maggots_dog.description: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot.  It thinks you arestealing mushrooms.

fang_farmer_maggots_dog.name: Fang, Farmer Maggot's dog
fang_farmer_maggots_dog.description: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot.  It thinks you arestealing mushrooms.

giant_green_frog.name: Giant green frog
giant_green_frog.description: It is as big as a wolf.

freesia.name: Freesia
freesia.description: A striped housecat who enjoys hunting.

green_worm_mass.name: Green worm mass
green_worm_mass.description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

large_yellow_snake.name: Large yellow snake
large_yellow_snake.description: It is about ten feet long.

cave_spider.name: Cave spider
cave_spider.description: It is a black spider that moves in fits and starts.

crow.name: Crow
crow.description: It is a hooded crow, gray except for the black wings and head.

wild_cat.name: Wild cat
wild_cat.description: A larger than normal feline, hissing loudly.  Its velvet claws conceal afistful of needles.

smeagol.name: Smeagol
smeagol.description: "Down the face of a precipice, sheer and almost smooth it seemed in the palemoonlight, a small black shape was moving with its thin limbs splayed out.Maybe its soft clinging hands and toes were used, but it looked as if it wasjust creeping down on sticky pads, like some large prowling thing ofinsect-kind.  And it was coming down head first, as if it was smelling itsway.  Now and again it lifted its head slowly, turning it right back on itslong skinny neck, and the hobbits caught a glimpse of two small pale gleaminglights, its eyes that blinked at the moon for a moment and then were quicklylidded again."

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.description: It is a ghastly, ghostly form.

yellow_jelly.name: Yellow jelly
yellow_jelly.description: It's a large pile of yellow flesh.

metallic_blue_centipede.name: Metallic blue centipede
metallic_blue_centipede.description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

raven.name: Raven
raven.description: Larger than a crow, pitch black.

piranha.name: Piranha
piranha.description: Bloodthirsty fish who can smell your blood from a great distance.

black_naga.name: Black naga
black_naga.description: A large black serpent's body with a female torso.

silver_jelly.name: Silver jelly
silver_jelly.description: It is a large pile of silver flesh that sucks all light from itssurroundings.

scruffy_looking_hobbit.name: Scruffy looking hobbit
scruffy_looking_hobbit.description: A short little guy, in bedraggled clothes.  He appears to be lookingfor a good tavern.

giant_white_ant.name: Giant white ant
giant_white_ant.description: It is about two feet long and has sharp pincers.

yellow_mold.name: Yellow mold
yellow_mold.description: It is a strange growth on the dungeon floor.

metallic_red_centipede.name: Metallic red centipede
metallic_red_centipede.description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

yellow_worm_mass.name: Yellow worm mass
yellow_worm_mass.description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

clear_worm_mass.name: Clear worm mass
clear_worm_mass.description: It is a disgusting mass of poisonous worms.

radiation_eye.name: Radiation eye
radiation_eye.description: A disembodied eye, crackling with energy.

cave_lizard.name: Cave lizard
cave_lizard.description: It is an armoured lizard with a powerful bite.

novice_ranger_83.name: Novice ranger
novice_ranger_83.description: An agile hunter, ready and relaxed.

blue_jelly.name: Blue jelly
blue_jelly.description: It's a large pile of pulsing blue flesh.

creeping_copper_coins.name: Creeping copper coins
creeping_copper_coins.description: It is a pile of coins.

giant_white_rat.name: Giant white rat
giant_white_rat.description: It is a very vicious rodent.

snotling.name: Snotling
snotling.description: A pathetic breed of tiny snaga-like creatures. They are runningwild and screaming all the time!

swordfish.name: Swordfish
swordfish.description: A fish with a swordlike upper jaw.

blue_worm_mass.name: Blue worm mass
blue_worm_mass.description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

large_grey_snake.name: Large grey snake
large_grey_snake.description: It is about ten feet long.

skeleton_kobold.name: Skeleton kobold
skeleton_kobold.description: It is a small animated kobold skeleton.

ewok.name: Ewok
ewok.description: A cute, furry little animal, full of merchandising potential.

novice_mage_93.name: Novice mage
novice_mage_93.description: He is leaving behind a trail of dropped spell components.

green_naga.name: Green naga
green_naga.description: A large green serpent with a female's torso.  Her green skin glistens withacid.

giant_leech.name: Giant leech
giant_leech.description: Yech! The disgusting thing only wants your blood!

barracuda.name: Barracuda
barracuda.description: A predatory fish with razor-sharp teeth.

novice_paladin_97.name: Novice paladin
novice_paladin_97.description: An adventurer both devoutly religious and skillful in combat.He seems to consider you an agent of the devil.

zog.name: Zog
zog.description: Drooling, insectoid aliens with disgusting habits.

green_glutton_ghost.name: Green glutton ghost
green_glutton_ghost.description: It is a very ugly green ghost with a voracious appetite.

green_jelly.name: Green jelly
green_jelly.description: It is a large pile of pulsing green flesh.

large_kobold.name: Large kobold
large_kobold.description: It a man-sized figure with the all too recognizable face of a kobold.

grey_icky_thing.name: Grey icky thing
grey_icky_thing.description: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, nasty creature.

disenchanter_eye.name: Disenchanter eye
disenchanter_eye.description: A disembodied eye, crackling with magic.

red_worm_mass.name: Red worm mass
red_worm_mass.description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

copperhead_snake.name: Copperhead snake
copperhead_snake.description: It has a copper head and sharp venomous fangs.

death_sword.name: Death sword
death_sword.description: A bloodthirsty blade lurking for prey. Beware!

novice_priest_109.name: Novice priest
novice_priest_109.description: He is tripping over his priestly robes.

nibelung.name: Nibelung
nibelung.description: Night dwarfs collecting new riches for their master, Alberich.

disembodied_hand_that_strangled_people.name: Disembodied hand that strangled people
disembodied_hand_that_strangled_people.description: Even today, nobody knows where it lurks...

brown_mold.name: Brown mold
brown_mold.description: A strange brown growth on the dungeon floor.

ratthing.name: Rat-thing
ratthing.description: A ratlike creature with a humanlike face. "The bones of thetiny paws, it is rumoured, imply prehensile characteristicsmore typical of a diminutive monkey than a of a rat; while thesmall skull with its savage yellow fangs is of the utmostanomalousness, appearing from certain angles like a miniature,monstrously degrade parody of a human skull."

novice_archer.name: Novice archer
novice_archer.description: A nasty little fellow with a bow and arrow.

creeping_silver_coins.name: Creeping silver coins
creeping_silver_coins.description: It is a pile of coins, crawling forward on thousands of tiny legs.

snaga.name: Snaga
snaga.description: He is one of the many weaker 'slave' orcs, often mistakenly known as agoblin.

rattlesnake.name: Rattlesnake
rattlesnake.description: It is recognized by the hard-scaled end of its body that is often rattledto frighten its prey.

giant_slug.name: Giant slug
giant_slug.description: It is slowly making its way towards you, eating everything inits path...

dark_elf.name: Dark elf
dark_elf.description: An elven figure with jet black skin and white hair, his eyes are large andtwisted with evil.

zombified_kobold.name: Zombified kobold
zombified_kobold.description: It is an animated kobold corpse.  Flesh falls off in large chunks as itshambles forward.

crypt_creep.name: Crypt Creep
crypt_creep.description: Frightening skeletal figures in black robes.

rotting_corpse.name: Rotting corpse
rotting_corpse.description: Corpses awakened from their sleep by dark sorceries.

cave_orc.name: Cave orc
cave_orc.description: He is often found in huge numbers in deep caves.

manes.name: Manes
manes.description: It is a minor but aggressive demon.

bloodshot_eye.name: Bloodshot eye
bloodshot_eye.description: A disembodied eye, bloodshot and nasty.

red_naga.name: Red naga
red_naga.description: A large red snake with a woman's torso.

red_jelly.name: Red jelly
red_jelly.description: It is a large pulsating mound of red flesh.

green_icky_thing.name: Green icky thing
green_icky_thing.description: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, acidic creature.

night_lizard.name: Night lizard
night_lizard.description: It is a black lizard with overlapping scales and a powerful jaw.

mughash_the_kobold_lord.name: Mughash the Kobold Lord
mughash_the_kobold_lord.description: Strong and powerful, for a kobold.

skeleton_orc.name: Skeleton orc
skeleton_orc.description: It is an animated orc skeleton.

wormtongue_agent_of_saruman.name: Wormtongue, Agent of Saruman
wormtongue_agent_of_saruman.description: He's been spying for Saruman.  He is a snivelling wretch with no morals."At [Theoden's] feet upon the steps sat a wizened figure of a man, with apale wise face and heavy-lidded eyes...he laughed grimly, as he lifted hisheavy lids for a moment and gazed on the strangers with dark eyes."

robin_hood_the_outlaw.name: Robin Hood, the Outlaw
robin_hood_the_outlaw.description: The legendary archer steals from the rich (you qualify).

nurgling.name: Nurgling
nurgling.description: It is a minor demon servitor of Nurgle. It looks like a hairlessteddy bear, with twisted eyes and rotting, ghoulish skin.

lagduf_the_snaga.name: Lagduf, the Snaga
lagduf_the_snaga.description: A captain of a regiment of weaker orcs, Lagduf keeps his troop in orderwith displays of excessive violence."I've told you twice that Gorbag's swine got to the gate first, and noneof ours got out.  Lagduf and Muzgash ran through, but they were shot."

brown_yeek.name: Brown yeek
brown_yeek.description: It is a strange small humanoid.

novice_ranger_142.name: Novice ranger
novice_ranger_142.description: An agile hunter, ready and relaxed.

giant_salamander.name: Giant salamander
giant_salamander.description: A large black and yellow lizard.  You'd better run away!

space_monster.name: Space monster
space_monster.description: A black hole in the fabric of reality.

green_mold.name: Green mold
green_mold.description: It is a strange growth on the dungeon floor.

novice_paladin_147.name: Novice paladin
novice_paladin_147.description: He thinks you are an agent of the devil.

lemure.name: Lemure
lemure.description: It is the larval form of a major demon.

hill_orc.name: Hill orc
hill_orc.description: He is a hardy well-weathered survivor.

hunting_hawk_of_julian.name: Hunting hawk of Julian
hunting_hawk_of_julian.description: Trained to hunt and kill without fear.

phantom_warrior.name: Phantom warrior
phantom_warrior.description: Creatures that are half real, half illusion.

gremlin.name: Gremlin
gremlin.description: Don't splash water on them, and don't feed them after midnight!

yeti.name: Yeti
yeti.description: A large white figure covered in shaggy fur.

bloodshot_icky_thing.name: Bloodshot icky thing
bloodshot_icky_thing.description: It is a strange, slimy, icky creature.

giant_grey_rat.name: Giant grey rat
giant_grey_rat.description: It is a rodent of unusual size.

black_harpy.name: Black harpy
black_harpy.description: A woman's face on the body of a vicious black bird.

skaven.name: Skaven
skaven.description: A mutated rat-creature from the great waste, it is vaguelyhumanoid in appearance and walks on its hind legs. This raceserves chaos fervently and is greatly feared by others.

the_wounded_bear.name: The wounded bear
the_wounded_bear.description: A wounded bear, who has occasionally attacked humans.

portuguese_manowar.name: Portuguese man-o-war
portuguese_manowar.description: A strange water creature, whose touch can be deadly.

rock_mole.name: Rock mole
rock_mole.description: Despite its minuscule size, this mole creature has fangs powerfulenough to bore through solid rock.

orc_shaman.name: Orc shaman
orc_shaman.description: An orc dressed in skins who gestures wildly.

baby_blue_dragon.name: Baby blue dragon
baby_blue_dragon.description: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light andits scales a pale blue.

baby_white_dragon.name: Baby white dragon
baby_white_dragon.description: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light andits scales a pale white.

baby_green_dragon.name: Baby green dragon
baby_green_dragon.description: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light andits scales a sickly green.

baby_black_dragon.name: Baby black dragon
baby_black_dragon.description: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light andits scales a dull black.

baby_red_dragon.name: Baby red dragon
baby_red_dragon.description: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light andits scales a pale red.

giant_red_ant.name: Giant red ant
giant_red_ant.description: It is large and has venomous mandibles.

brodda_the_easterling.name: Brodda, the Easterling
brodda_the_easterling.description: A nasty piece of work, Brodda picks on defenseless women and children."And Morwen was gone.  Empty stood her house, broken and cold.  It wasmore than a year since she departed to Doriath.  Brodda the Easterling(who had wedded Morwen's kinswoman Airin) had plundered her house, andtaken all that was left of her goods."

bloodfang_the_wolf.name: Bloodfang the Wolf
bloodfang_the_wolf.description: It has been terrorizing the nearby villages.

king_cobra.name: King cobra
king_cobra.description: It is a large snake with a hooded face.

war_bear.name: War bear
war_bear.description: Bears with tusks, trained to kill.

giant_spider.name: Giant spider
giant_spider.description: It is a vast black spider whose bulbous body is bloated with poison.

giant_white_tick.name: Giant white tick
giant_white_tick.description: It is moving slowly towards you.

the_borshin.name: The Borshin
the_borshin.description: Pallid and twisted, this creature hates the very sight of you."It looked like something that had started out to be a man but had neverquite made it. It had been stepped on, twisted, had holes poked into thesickly dough of its head-bulge. Bones showed through the transparent fleshof its torso and its short legs were as thick as trees, terminating indisk-shaped pads from which dozens of long toes hung like roots or worms.its arms were longer than its entire body. it was a crushed slug, a thingthat had been frozen and thawed before it was fully baked. It was -'It is the Borshin', said the Lord of Bats."

dark_elven_mage.name: Dark elven mage
dark_elven_mage.description: A dark elven figure, dressed all in black, hurling spells at you.

kamikaze_yeek.name: Kamikaze yeek
kamikaze_yeek.description: The evil wizard Bruce has trained them to be living weapons.

orfax_son_of_boldor.name: Orfax, Son of Boldor
orfax_son_of_boldor.description: He's just like daddy!  He knows mighty spells, but fortunately he is ayeek.

servant_of_glaaki.name: Servant of Glaaki
servant_of_glaaki.description: "...the hand of a corpse -- bloodless and skeletal, and withimpossibly long, cracked nails."

dark_elven_warrior.name: Dark elven warrior
dark_elven_warrior.description: A dark elven figure in armour and ready with his sword.

sanddweller.name: Sand-dweller
sanddweller.description: "Rough-skinned, large-eyed, large-eared, with a horrible,distorted resemblance to the koala bear facially, thoughhis body had an appearance of emaciation."

grishnakh_the_hill_orc.name: Grishnakh, the Hill Orc
grishnakh_the_hill_orc.description: He is a cunning and devious orc."Grishnakh [was] a short crook-legged creature, very broad and withlong arms that hung almost to the ground."

giant_piranha.name: Giant piranha
giant_piranha.description: A very large and bloodthirsty fish.

owlbear.name: Owlbear
owlbear.description: A bizarre bear-creature with the claws and the face of an owl.

blue_horror.name: Blue horror
blue_horror.description: An ugly screaming little demon servant of Tzeentch.

hairy_mold.name: Hairy mold
hairy_mold.description: It is a strange hairy growth on the dungeon floor.

disenchanter_mold.name: Disenchanter mold
disenchanter_mold.description: It is a strange glowing growth on the dungeon floor.

pseudo_dragon.name: Pseudo dragon
pseudo_dragon.description: A small relative of the dragon that inhabits dark caves.

tengu.name: Tengu
tengu.description: It is a fast-moving demon that blinks quickly in and out of existence; noother demon matches its teleporting mastery.

creeping_gold_coins.name: Creeping gold coins
creeping_gold_coins.description: It is a pile of coins, crawling forward on thousands of tiny legs.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.description: It howls and snaps at you.

panther.name: Panther
panther.description: A large black cat, stalking you with intent.  It thinks you're its nextmeal.

tax_collector.name: Tax collector
tax_collector.description: He is eyeing your purse suspiciously.

hobbes_the_tiger.name: Hobbes the Tiger
hobbes_the_tiger.description: Fast-moving, with a taste for tuna sandwiches.

shadow_creature.name: Shadow creature
shadow_creature.description: "There was something unusual about their appearance... For one thing,all had uniformly bloodshot eyes. Very, very bloodshot eyes. With them,though, the condition seemed normal. For another, all had an extra jointto each finger and thumb, and sharp, forward-curving spurs on the backsof their hands. All of them had prominent jaws (and) forty-four teeth,most of them longer than human teeth, and several looking to be muchsharper. Their flesh was grayish and hard and shiny. There wereundoubtedly other differences also, but those were sufficient to provea point of some sort."

undead_mass.name: Undead mass
undead_mass.description: A sickening mound of decaying flesh, bones, hands and so on. It seems tobe growing.

chaos_shapechanger.name: Chaos shapechanger
chaos_shapechanger.description: A vaguely humanoid form constantly changing its appearance.

baby_multihued_dragon.name: Baby multi-hued dragon
baby_multihued_dragon.description: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light andits scales shimmering with a hint of colour.

vorpal_bunny.name: Vorpal bunny
vorpal_bunny.description: It looks very cute, except for the razor sharp teeth. It moansominously as it jumps at your throat!

old_man_willow.name: Old Man Willow
old_man_willow.description: "...a huge willow-tree, old and hoary. Enormous it looked, itssprawling branches going up like racing arms with may long-lingered hands, its knotted and twisted trunk gaping in widefissures that creaked faintly as the boughs moved."

hippocampus.name: Hippocampus
hippocampus.description: A truly strange hybrid of a horse and a fish.

zombified_orc.name: Zombified orc
zombified_orc.description: It is a shambling orcish corpse leaving behind a trail of flesh.

hippogriff.name: Hippogriff
hippogriff.description: A strange hybrid of eagle, lion and horse.  It looks weird.

black_mamba.name: Black mamba
black_mamba.description: It has glistening black skin, a sleek body and highly venomous fangs.

white_wolf.name: White wolf
white_wolf.description: A large and muscled wolf from the northern wastes.  Its breath is cold andicy and its fur coated in frost.

grape_jelly.name: Grape jelly
grape_jelly.description: It is a pulsing mound of glowing flesh.

nether_worm_mass.name: Nether worm mass
nether_worm_mass.description: It is a disgusting mass of dark worms, eating each other, the floor,the air, you....

abyss_worm_mass.name: Abyss worm mass
abyss_worm_mass.description: Even more disgusting dark worms, their essence that of unbeing.

golfimbul_the_hill_orc_chief.name: Golfimbul, the Hill Orc Chief
golfimbul_the_hill_orc_chief.description: A leader of a band of raiding orcs, he picks on hobbits.

skaven_shaman.name: Skaven shaman
skaven_shaman.description: The shaman of a skaven tribe gets his powers from a mysticstone corrupted by chaos, called a Warp Stone.

gazer.name: Gazer
gazer.description: A floating eye surrounded by number of smaller eyestalks. Itsgaze seems mesmerizing.

knight_archer.name: Knight archer
knight_archer.description: A warrior trained in melee as well as missile weapons.

ixitxachitl.name: Ixitxachitl
ixitxachitl.description: A devil ray of the depths.

minedog.name: Mine-dog
minedog.description: An explosive charge has been attached to this poor animal, whohas been trained to search for its target and detonate.

hellcat.name: Hellcat
hellcat.description: It is as large as a tiger, its yellow eyes are pupilless.

moon_beast.name: Moon beast
moon_beast.description: "Great greyish-white slippery things which could expand andcontract at will, and whose principle shape... was that of asort of toad without any eyes, but with a curious vibrating massof short pink tentacles on the end of its blung, vague snout."

master_yeek.name: Master yeek
master_yeek.description: A small humanoid that radiates some power.

priest.name: Priest
priest.description: A robed humanoid dedicated to his god.

dark_elven_priest.name: Dark elven priest
dark_elven_priest.description: A dark elven figure, dressed all in black, chanting curses and waiting todeliver your soul to hell.

skeleton_human.name: Skeleton human
skeleton_human.description: It is an animated human skeleton.

zombified_human.name: Zombified human
zombified_human.description: It is a shambling human corpse dropping chunks of flesh behind it.

tiger.name: Tiger
tiger.description: One of the largest of its species, a sleek orange and black shape creepstowards you, ready to pounce.

moaning_spirit.name: Moaning spirit
moaning_spirit.description: A ghostly apparition that shrieks horribly.

frumious_bandersnatch.name: Frumious bandersnatch
frumious_bandersnatch.description: It is a vast armoured centipede with massive mandibles and a spiked tail. Keep it away from sunflowers.

drider.name: Drider
drider.description: A dark elven torso merged with the bloated form of a giant spider.

killer_brown_beetle.name: Killer brown beetle
killer_brown_beetle.description: It is a vicious insect with a tough carapace.

boldor_king_of_the_yeeks.name: Boldor, King of the Yeeks
boldor_king_of_the_yeeks.description: A great yeek, powerful in magic and sorcery, but a yeek all the same.

ogre.name: Ogre
ogre.description: A hideous, smallish giant that is often found near or with orcs.

creeping_mithril_coins.name: Creeping mithril coins
creeping_mithril_coins.description: It is a pile of coins, shambling forward on thousands of tiny legs.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: A mystic at one with nature.  Om.

pink_horror.name: Pink horror
pink_horror.description: An ugly screaming little demon servant of Tzeentch.

cloaker.name: Cloaker
cloaker.description: It resembles a normal cloak until some poor fool ventures too close!

black_orc.name: Black orc
black_orc.description: He is a large orc with powerful arms and deep black skin.

ochre_jelly.name: Ochre jelly
ochre_jelly.description: A fast moving highly acidic jelly thing, that is eating away the floor itrests on.

lurker.name: Lurker
lurker.description: A strange creature that merges with the dungeon floor, trapping itsvictims by enveloping them within its perfectly disguised form.

nixie.name: Nixie
nixie.description: A race of fair yet belligrent sea elves.

vlasta.name: Vlasta
vlasta.description: This strange creature looks like a miniature tyrannosaurus. It hasempty, pale eyes and a sharp beak, which it aims at your eyesas it jumps at you!

giant_white_dragon_fly.name: Giant white dragon fly
giant_white_dragon_fly.description: It is a large fly that drips frost.

snaga_sapper.name: Snaga sapper
snaga_sapper.description: He is one of the many weaker 'slave' orcs, often mistakenly known as agoblin. He is equipped with an explosive charge.

blue_icky_thing.name: Blue icky thing
blue_icky_thing.description: It is a strange, slimy, icky creature, with rudimentary intelligence,but evil cunning.  It hungers for food, and you look tasty.

gibbering_mouther.name: Gibbering mouther
gibbering_mouther.description: A chaotic mass of pulsating flesh, mouths and eyes.

hill_giant.name: Hill giant
hill_giant.description: A ten foot tall humanoid with powerful muscles.

flesh_golem.name: Flesh golem
flesh_golem.description: A shambling humanoid monster with long scars.

warg.name: Warg
warg.description: It is a large wolf with eyes full of cunning.

giant_flea.name: Giant flea
giant_flea.description: It makes you itch just to look at it.

ufthak_of_cirith_ungol.name: Ufthak of Cirith Ungol
ufthak_of_cirith_ungol.description: A strong orc guarding the pass of Cirith Ungol.  He is mortally afraid ofspiders.

clay_golem.name: Clay golem
clay_golem.description: It is a massive animated statue made out of hardened clay.

black_ogre.name: Black ogre
black_ogre.description: A massive orc-like figure with black skin and powerful arms.

dweller_on_the_threshold.name: Dweller on the threshold
dweller_on_the_threshold.description: A creature like a giant purple Buddha with lots of teeth. It cleans them with the bones of sorcerors.

halforc.name: Half-orc
halforc.description: He is a hideous deformed cross-breed with man and orc, combining man'sstrength and cunning with orcish evil.

dark_naga.name: Dark naga
dark_naga.description: A giant snake-like figure with a woman's torso. Not as strongas other nagas, but more talented in magic.

giant_octopus.name: Giant octopus
giant_octopus.description: It doesn't move very fast, but when it does - watch out!

magic_mushroom_patch.name: Magic mushroom patch
magic_mushroom_patch.description: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.  It seems to glow with an unusual light.

plaguebearer_of_nurgle.name: Plaguebearer of Nurgle
plaguebearer_of_nurgle.description: An unfortunate individual, who was killed by the incurabledisease known as Nurgle's Rot, and was transformed into arotting demon zombie. It has but one eye, and a singlepale horn in its forehead.

guardian_naga.name: Guardian naga
guardian_naga.description: A giant snake-like figure with a woman's torso.

wererat.name: Wererat
wererat.description: A large rat with glowing red eyes.  The wererat is a disgusting creature,relishing in filth and disease.

light_hound.name: Light hound
light_hound.description: A brilliant canine form whose light hurts your eyes, even at this distance.

shadow_hound.name: Shadow hound
shadow_hound.description: A hole in the air in the shape of a huge hound.  No light falls upon itsform.

flying_skull.name: Flying skull
flying_skull.description: A skullpack animated by necromantic spells.

migo.name: Mi-Go
migo.description: "They were pinkish things about five feet long; with crustaceousbodies bearing vast pairs of dorsal fins or membranous wings andseveral sets of articulate limbs, and with a sort of convolutedellipsoid, covered with multitudes of very short antenna, wherea head would ordinarily be..."

giant_tarantula.name: Giant tarantula
giant_tarantula.description: A giant spider with hairy black and red legs.

giant_clear_centipede.name: Giant clear centipede
giant_clear_centipede.description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

mirkwood_spider.name: Mirkwood spider
mirkwood_spider.description: A strong and powerful spider from Mirkwood forest.  Cunning and evil, itseeks to taste your juicy insides.

frost_giant.name: Frost giant
frost_giant.description: A twelve foot tall giant covered in furs.

griffon.name: Griffon
griffon.description: It is half lion, half eagle.  It flies menacingly towards you.

homonculous.name: Homonculous
homonculous.description: It is a small demonic spirit full of malevolence.

umber_hulk.name: Umber hulk
umber_hulk.description: This bizarre creature has glaring eyes and large mandibles capable ofslicing through rock.

rust_monster.name: Rust monster
rust_monster.description: It is a weird, small animal with two antennae popping forth fromits forehead. It looks hungry.

orc_captain.name: Orc captain
orc_captain.description: An armoured orc with an air of authority.

gelatinous_cube.name: Gelatinous cube
gelatinous_cube.description: It is a strange, vast gelatinous structure that assumes cubic proportionsas it lines all four walls of the corridors it patrols.  Through itstransparent jelly structure you can see treasures it has engulfed, and afew corpses as well.

fire_giant.name: Fire giant
fire_giant.description: A glowing fourteen foot tall giant.  Flames drip from its red skin.

hummerhorn.name: Hummerhorn
hummerhorn.description: A giant buzzing wasp, its stinger drips venom.

lizardman.name: Lizardman
lizardman.description: Intelligent lizard beings from the depths.

hammerhead.name: Hammerhead
hammerhead.description: A hungry shark with a strange head.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: A warrior in a battle-frenzy; he'll stop only when he drops.

quasit.name: Quasit
quasit.description: The chaotic evil master's favourite pet.

sphinx.name: Sphinx
sphinx.description: It will eat you if you cannot answer its riddle.

imp.name: Imp
imp.description: The lawful evil master's favourite pet.

forest_troll.name: Forest troll
forest_troll.description: He is green skinned and ugly.

2headed_hydra.name: 2-headed hydra
2headed_hydra.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with two heads, guarding its hoard.

swamp_thing.name: Swamp thing
swamp_thing.description: A creature that was once human, but is now as green as moss.

earth_spirit.name: Earth spirit
earth_spirit.description: A whirling form of sentient rock.

fire_hound.name: Fire hound
fire_hound.description: Flames lick at its feet and its tongue is a blade of fire.  You can feel afurnace heat radiating from the creature.

cold_hound.name: Cold hound
cold_hound.description: A hound as tall as a man, this creature appears to be composed of angularplanes of ice.  Cold radiates from it and freezes your breath in the air.

energy_hound.name: Energy hound
energy_hound.description: Saint Elmo's Fire forms a ghostly halo around this hound, and sparks stingyour fingers as energy builds up in the air around you.

potion_mimic.name: Potion mimic
potion_mimic.description: A strange creature that disguises itself as discarded objects to lureunsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

door_mimic.name: Door mimic
door_mimic.description: A strange creature that disguises itself as a door to lureunsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

blink_dog.name: Blink dog
blink_dog.description: A strange magical member of the canine race, its form seems to shimmer andfade in front of your very eyes.

uruk.name: Uruk
uruk.description: He is a cunning orc of power, as tall as a man, and stronger.  It fearslittle.

shagrat_the_orc_captain.name: Shagrat, the Orc Captain
shagrat_the_orc_captain.description: He is an Uruk of power and great cunning.

gorbag_the_orc_captain.name: Gorbag, the Orc Captain
gorbag_the_orc_captain.description: A gruesomely ugly but cunning orc, his eyes regard you with hatred.  Hispowerful arms flex menacingly as he advances.

shambling_mound.name: Shambling mound
shambling_mound.description: A pile of rotting vegetation that slides towards you with a disgustingstench, waking all it nears.

white_shark.name: White shark
white_shark.description: Fast moving hunter of the depths, when this creature moves,everybody in water is in danger!

chaos_beastman.name: Chaos beastman
chaos_beastman.description: A truly loathsome thing, twisted by chaos, it is a mixtureof several different kinds of creature.

daemonette_of_slaanesh.name: Daemonette of Slaanesh
daemonette_of_slaanesh.description: It is minor female demon, vaguely human-like, but with crab-likepincers instead of hands. She wears a rather indecent skimpyleather bikini, moves quickly and casts deadly spells!

giant_bronze_dragon_fly.name: Giant bronze dragon fly
giant_bronze_dragon_fly.description: This vast gleaming bronze fly has wings which beat mesmerically fast.

stone_giant.name: Stone giant
stone_giant.description: It is eighteen feet tall and looking at you.

giant_black_dragon_fly.name: Giant black dragon fly
giant_black_dragon_fly.description: The size of a large bird, this fly drips caustic acid.

stone_golem.name: Stone golem
stone_golem.description: It is a massive animated statue.

red_mold.name: Red mold
red_mold.description: It is a strange red growth on the dungeon floor; it seems to burn withflame.

giant_gold_dragon_fly.name: Giant gold dragon fly
giant_gold_dragon_fly.description: Large beating wings support this dazzling insect.  A loud buzzing noisepervades the air.

ghast.name: Ghast
ghast.description: A repulsive being which leaps on long hind legs like a kangaroo.Its face is curiously human despite the absence of a nose, aforehead, and "other important particulars".

ixitxachitl_priest.name: Ixitxachitl priest
ixitxachitl_priest.description: A devil ray of the depths, with priestly magic.

huorn.name: Huorn
huorn.description: A very strong near-sentient tree, which has become hostileto humanoid forms of life.

bolg_son_of_azog.name: Bolg, Son of Azog
bolg_son_of_azog.description: A large and powerful orc.  He looks just like his daddy.  He is tall andfast, but fortunately blessed with orcish brains.

phase_spider.name: Phase spider
phase_spider.description: A spider that never seems quite there.  Everywhere you look it is justhalf-seen in the corner of one eye.

landmine.name: Landmine
landmine.description: It was left here to be used against intruders.

wyvern.name: Wyvern
wyvern.description: A fast-moving and deadly dragonian animal. Beware its poisonous sting!

great_eagle.name: Great eagle
great_eagle.description: An agent of supernatural beings, this creature looks like ahuge eagle.

earth_hound.name: Earth hound
earth_hound.description: A beautiful crystalline shape does not disguise the danger this houndclearly presents.  Your flesh tingles as it approaches.

air_hound.name: Air hound
air_hound.description: Swirling vapours surround this beast as it floats towards you, seeminglywalking on air.  Noxious gases sting your throat.

sabretooth_tiger.name: Sabre-tooth tiger
sabretooth_tiger.description: A fierce and dangerous cat, its huge tusks and sharp claws would lacerateeven the strongest armour.

water_hound.name: Water hound
water_hound.description: Liquid footprints follow this hound as it pads around the dungeon.  Anacrid smell of acid rises from the dog's pelt.

chimera.name: Chimera
chimera.description: It is a strange concoction of lion, dragon and goat.  It looks very oddbut very avoidable.

quylthulg.name: Quylthulg
quylthulg.description: It is a strange pulsing mound of flesh.

sasquatch.name: Sasquatch
sasquatch.description: A tall shaggy, furry humanoid, it could call the yeti brother.

weir.name: Weir
weir.description: It is a tracker; half human, half beast.

whale.name: Whale
whale.description: Although it looks like a fish and lives in water, it is in facta mammal. And it is huge!

electric_eel.name: Electric eel
electric_eel.description: This cute little serpentine creature can create a deadly voltage.Better watch out!

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.description: It is a huge wolf with eyes that glow with manly intelligence.

dark_elven_lord.name: Dark elven lord
dark_elven_lord.description: A dark elven figure in armour and radiating evil power.

cloud_giant.name: Cloud giant
cloud_giant.description: It is a twenty foot tall giant wreathed in clouds.

ugluk_the_uruk.name: Ugluk, the Uruk
ugluk_the_uruk.description: Another of Morgoth's servants, this orc is strong and cunning.  He is uglyand scarred from many power struggles.

blue_dragon_bat.name: Blue dragon bat
blue_dragon_bat.description: It is a glowing blue bat with a sharp tail.

scroll_mimic.name: Scroll mimic
scroll_mimic.description: A strange creature that disguises itself as discarded objects to lureunsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

chest_mimic.name: Chest mimic
chest_mimic.description: A strange creature that disguises itself as a chest to lureunsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

water_vortex.name: Water vortex
water_vortex.description: A caustic spinning whirlpool of water.

lugdush_the_uruk.name: Lugdush, the Uruk
lugdush_the_uruk.description: A strong and cunning orc warrior, Lugdush sneers as he insults your mother.

archvile.name: Arch-vile
archvile.description: A pale, corpse-like lesser demon, who moves very fast and spawns evileverywhere.

energy_vortex.name: Energy vortex
energy_vortex.description: A shimmering tornado of air, sparks crackle along its length.

globefish.name: Globefish
globefish.description: This cute fish is among the most poisonous creatures there are.

carrion.name: Carrion
carrion.description: A mummified, undead great avian creature, who now serves asa steed for mighty undead creatures.

mummified_orc.name: Mummified orc
mummified_orc.description: It is an orcish figure covered in wrappings.

serpent_man.name: Serpent man
serpent_man.description: "They walked lithely and sinnously erect on pre-mammalianmembers, their pied and hairless bodies bending with greatsuppleness. There was a loud hissing of formulae as theywent to and fro."

vampiric_mist.name: Vampiric mist
vampiric_mist.description: A cloud of evil, sentient mist.

killer_stag_beetle.name: Killer stag beetle
killer_stag_beetle.description: It is a giant beetle with vicious claws.

iron_golem.name: Iron golem
iron_golem.description: It is a massive metal statue that moves steadily towards you.

autoroller.name: Auto-roller
autoroller.description: It looks like a huge spiked roller, moving on its own towards you.

giant_yellow_scorpion.name: Giant yellow scorpion
giant_yellow_scorpion.description: It is a giant scorpion with a sharp stinger.

jade_monk.name: Jade monk
jade_monk.description: A green-garbed monk, trained in martial arts.

black_ooze.name: Black ooze
black_ooze.description: It is a strangely moving puddle.

hardened_warrior.name: Hardened warrior
hardened_warrior.description: A scarred warrior who moves with confidence.

azog_king_of_the_urukhai.name: Azog, King of the Uruk-Hai
azog_king_of_the_urukhai.description: He is also known as the King of Khazad-dum.  His ego is renowned to bebigger than his head.

fleshhound_of_khorne.name: Fleshhound of Khorne
fleshhound_of_khorne.description: A revolting canine creature, a huge demon hound with a somewhatreptilian head.

dark_elven_warlock.name: Dark elven warlock
dark_elven_warlock.description: A dark elven mage with spells of frightening destructive power.

master_rogue.name: Master rogue
master_rogue.description: A thief of great power and shifty speed.

red_dragon_bat.name: Red dragon bat
red_dragon_bat.description: It is a sharp-tailed bat, wreathed in fire.

ice_skeleton.name: Ice skeleton
ice_skeleton.description: It is a skeleton covered in frost.

angamaite_of_umbar.name: Angamaite of Umbar
angamaite_of_umbar.description: A Black Numenorean who hates the men of the west.

kouko.name: Kouko
kouko.description: It is a ghostly apparition with a humanoid form.

mime_the_nibelung.name: Mime, the Nibelung
mime_the_nibelung.description: This tiny night dwarf is as greedy for gold as his brother, Alberich.

hagen_son_of_alberich.name: Hagen, son of Alberich
hagen_son_of_alberich.description: Alberich's son, born of a mortal woman won with gold.

meneldor_the_swift.name: Meneldor the Swift
meneldor_the_swift.description: An agent of supernatural beings, this creature looks like ahuge eagle.

phantom_beast.name: Phantom beast
phantom_beast.description: A creature that is half real, half illusion.

4headed_hydra.name: 4-headed hydra
4headed_hydra.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with four heads, guarding its hoard.

lesser_hellbeast.name: Lesser hell-beast
lesser_hellbeast.description: This creature just might crush you.

tyrannosaurus.name: Tyrannosaurus
tyrannosaurus.description: A horror from prehistory, reawakened by chaos.

mummified_human.name: Mummified human
mummified_human.description: It is a human form encased in mouldy wrappings.

vampire_bat.name: Vampire bat
vampire_bat.description: An undead bat that flies at your neck hungrily.

sangahyando_of_umbar.name: Sangahyando of Umbar
sangahyando_of_umbar.description: A Black Numenorean with a blacker heart.

banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.description: It is a ghostly woman's form that wails mournfully.

carrion_crawler_395.name: Carrion crawler
carrion_crawler_395.description: A hideous centipede covered in slime and with glowing tentacles around itshead.

xiclotlan.name: Xiclotlan
xiclotlan.description: "...a metallically grey tree... about sixteen feet high withvery thick cylindrical branches... cylinders furtherdivided into six flat circular extensions... and from the topof what I had taken for a trunk rose a featureless oval... anorifice gaping at the top."

silent_watcher.name: Silent watcher
silent_watcher.description: A figure carved from stone, with three vulture faces. Their eyes glowa malevolent light...

pukelman.name: Pukelman
pukelman.description: A stumpy figure carved from stone, with glittering eyes.

disenchanter_beast.name: Disenchanter beast
disenchanter_beast.description: It looks like an anteater, and there is a static feelingcrackling around its long trunk.

dark_elven_druid.name: Dark elven druid
dark_elven_druid.description: A powerful dark elf, with mighty nature-controlling enchantments.

stone_troll.name: Stone troll
stone_troll.description: He is a giant troll with scabrous black skin.

black.name: Black
black.description: The eldritch blood of Yibb-Tstll is know only as "the Black": it isan amorphous substance, who will suck your life and deliver it toYibb-Tstll.

troll_priest.name: Troll priest
troll_priest.description: A troll who is so bright he knows how to read.

wereworm.name: Wereworm
wereworm.description: A huge wormlike shape dripping acid, twisted by evil sorcery into a foulmonster that breeds on death.

killer_crimson_beetle.name: Killer crimson beetle
killer_crimson_beetle.description: A giant beetle with poisonous mandibles.

vampiric_ixitxachitl.name: Vampiric ixitxachitl
vampiric_ixitxachitl.description: A devil ray of the depths, with vampiric powers.

gnophkeh.name: Gnoph-Keh
gnophkeh.description: A creature with a sharp horn: "the hairy myth-thing of theGreenland ice, that walked sometimes on two legs, sometimeson four, and sometimes on six."

giant_grey_ant.name: Giant grey ant
giant_grey_ant.description: It is an ant encased in shaggy grey fur.

kharis_the_powerslave.name: Kharis the Powerslave
kharis_the_powerslave.description: He is out to have a revenge on you who have desecrated his tomb.

gwaihir_the_windlord.name: Gwaihir the Windlord
gwaihir_the_windlord.description: An agent of supernatural beings, this creature looks like ahuge eagle.

giant_red_tick.name: Giant red tick
giant_red_tick.description: It is smoking and burning with great heat.

displacer_beast.name: Displacer beast
displacer_beast.description: It is a huge black panther, clubbed tentacles sprouting from its shoulders.

agent_of_benedict.name: Agent of Benedict
agent_of_benedict.description: A faithful servitor and a skilled warrior.

cave_ogre.name: Cave ogre
cave_ogre.description: A giant orc-like figure with an awesomely muscled frame.

white_wraith.name: White wraith
white_wraith.description: It is a tangible but ghostly form made of white fog.

angel.name: Angel
angel.description: A lesser angel wearing little more than a loincloth - its steely skinprovides all the protection it needs.

ghoul.name: Ghoul
ghoul.description: Flesh is falling off in chunks from this decaying abomination.

alberich_the_nibelung_king.name: Alberich the Nibelung King
alberich_the_nibelung_king.description: Made invisible with his magic cap, the greedy dwarf plots forworld domination through his riches.

hellblade.name: Hellblade
hellblade.description: A deadly blade of chaos, moving of its own volition.

killer_red_beetle.name: Killer red beetle
killer_red_beetle.description: It is a giant beetle wreathed in flames.

beast_of_nurgle.name: Beast of Nurgle
beast_of_nurgle.description: It walks on four legs, but mostly resembles a slug-shaped jelly.It even has two disgusting antennae in its head. Yecch!

creeping_adamantite_coins.name: Creeping adamantite coins
creeping_adamantite_coins.description: It is a pile of coins, slithering forward on thousands of tiny legs.

algroth.name: Algroth
algroth.description: A powerful troll form.  Venom drips from its needlelike claws.

flamer_of_tzeentch.name: Flamer of Tzeentch
flamer_of_tzeentch.description: It looks like an inverted mushroom, with two flexible arms.

roper.name: Roper
roper.description: This creature look like a pillar of rock. However, a closerinspection reveals a glaring eye and powerful tentacles,which crush its prey and feed it to the creature's hungrymouth.

headless.name: Headless
headless.description: Headless humanoid abominations created by a magical mutation.

vibration_hound.name: Vibration hound
vibration_hound.description: A blurry canine form which seems to be moving as fast as the eye canfollow.  You can feel the earth resonating beneath your feet.

nexus_hound.name: Nexus hound
nexus_hound.description: A locus of conflicting points coalesce to form the vague shape of a hugehound.  Or is it just your imagination?

ogre_mage.name: Ogre mage
ogre_mage.description: A hideous ogre wrapped in black sorcerous robes.

grendel.name: Grendel
grendel.description: An ogre renowned for acts of surpassing cruelty.

vampire.name: Vampire
vampire.description: It is a humanoid with an aura of power.  You notice a sharp set of frontteeth.

gorgimera.name: Gorgimera
gorgimera.description: It has 3 heads - gorgon, goat and dragon - all attached to alion's body.

shantak.name: Shantak
shantak.description: A scaly bird larger than an elephants, with a horse-like head.

colbran.name: Colbran
colbran.description: A man-shaped form of living lightning, sparks and shocks crackle all overthis madly capering figure, as it leaps and whirls around and about you.

spirit_naga.name: Spirit naga
spirit_naga.description: A wraithly snake-like form with the torso of a beautiful woman, it is themost powerful of its kind.

corpser.name: Corpser
corpser.description: A creature who lives underground and eats surfacedwellers whom it catcheswith its poisonous tentacle, which is the only part of the creature thatis ever seen. Perhaps it is better not to see the part which remainsunderground...

fiend_of_slaanesh.name: Fiend of Slaanesh
fiend_of_slaanesh.description: Slaanesh's pet, a large scorpion-like creature with a human face andreptile skin.

5headed_hydra.name: 5-headed hydra
5headed_hydra.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with five heads dripping venom.

barney_the_dinosaur.name: Barney the Dinosaur
barney_the_dinosaur.description: The lovable purple reptile is making a guest appearance here.  Flee whileyou still can!

black_knight.name: Black knight
black_knight.description: He is a figure encased in deep black plate armour; he looks at youmenacingly.

seahorse.name: Seahorse
seahorse.description: Your mind is filled with admiration as you view this wondrous,magical seahorse.

cyclops.name: Cyclops
cyclops.description: A gigantic humanoid with but one eye.

clairvoyant.name: Clairvoyant
clairvoyant.description: He is using his supernatural talents to bring about yourdestruction.

giant_purple_worm.name: Giant purple worm
giant_purple_worm.description: It is a massive worm form, many feet in length.  Its vast maw drips acidand poison.

catoblepas.name: Catoblepas
catoblepas.description: A strange ox-like form with a huge head but a thin, weak neck, it lookslike the creation of some deranged alchemist.

lesser_wall_monster.name: Lesser wall monster
lesser_wall_monster.description: A sentient, moving section of wall.

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: A fat mage with glasses and a pointy hat.

mind_flayer.name: Mind flayer
mind_flayer.description: A humanoid form with a gruesome head, tentacular mouth, and piercingeyes.  Claws reach out for you and you feel a presence invade your mind.

the_ultimate_dungeon_cleaner.name: The Ultimate Dungeon Cleaner
the_ultimate_dungeon_cleaner.description: It looks like a huge spiked roller. It was designed to keep this dungeonclean, and you are the biggest spot of dirt in sight.

deep_one.name: Deep one
deep_one.description: "I thought their predominant color was a greyish-green,though they had white bellies. They were mostly shiny andslippery, but the ridges of their backs were scaly. Theirforms vaguely suggested the anthropoid, while their heads werethe heads of fish, with prodigious bulging eyes that neverclosed. At the sides of their necks were palpitating gills andtheir long paws were webbed."

basilisk.name: Basilisk
basilisk.description: An evil reptile whose eyes stare deeply at you andmakes your soul wilt!

ice_troll.name: Ice troll
ice_troll.description: He is a white troll with powerfully clawed hands.

dhole.name: Dhole
dhole.description: A gigantic worm dripping with acid. "...even as he looked, onereared up several hundred feet and leveled a bleached, viscous endat him."

archangel.name: Archangel
archangel.description: A lesser angel protected by an aura of holiness.  Its muscular form looksextremely powerful next to your own frail body.

ring_mimic.name: Ring mimic
ring_mimic.description: A strange creature that disguises itself as discarded objects to lureunsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

chaos_tile.name: Chaos tile
chaos_tile.description: It is a floor tile corrupted by chaos.

young_blue_dragon.name: Young blue dragon
young_blue_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are adeep blue in hue.  Sparks crackle along its length.

young_white_dragon.name: Young white dragon
young_white_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are afrosty white in hue.  Icy blasts of cold air come from it as it breathes.

young_green_dragon.name: Young green dragon
young_green_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are adeep green in hue.  Foul gas seeps through its scales.

young_bronze_dragon.name: Young bronze dragon
young_bronze_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are arich bronze hue, and its shape masks its true form.

aklash.name: Aklash
aklash.description: Pale, bald, fat, hairless troll creatures. Ugly beyond description.Not to mention how bad their breath smells...

mithril_golem.name: Mithril golem
mithril_golem.description: It is a massive statue of purest mithril.  It looks expensive!

skeleton_troll.name: Skeleton troll
skeleton_troll.description: It is a troll skeleton animated by dark dweomers.

skeletal_tyrannosaurus.name: Skeletal tyrannosaurus
skeletal_tyrannosaurus.description: It is the skeleton of a tyrannosaurus, animated by dark dweomers.

jaws.name: Jaws
jaws.description: The biggest white shark who has ever lived, it is hunting for you now!

thorondor.name: Thorondor
thorondor.description: An agent of supernatural being, Thorondor is the lord of eagles.

giant_blue_ant.name: Giant blue ant
giant_blue_ant.description: It is a giant ant that crackles with energy.

grave_wight.name: Grave wight
grave_wight.description: It is a ghostly form with eyes that haunt you.

shadow_drake.name: Shadow drake
shadow_drake.description: It is a dragon-like form wrapped in shadow.  Glowing red eyes shine out inthe dark.

manticore.name: Manticore
manticore.description: It is a winged lion's body with a human torso and a tail covered invicious spikes.

giant_army_ant.name: Giant army ant
giant_army_ant.description: An armoured form moving with purpose.  Powerful on its own, flee whenhordes of them march.

killer_slicer_beetle.name: Killer slicer beetle
killer_slicer_beetle.description: It is a beetle with deadly sharp cutting mandibles and a rock-hardcarapace.

gorgon.name: Gorgon
gorgon.description: A bull whose skin is made of steel plates. Watch out for itsdeadly breath!

gug.name: Gug
gug.description: A hideous, beastly, four-armed unclean giant: "...large as abarrel... The eyes jutted two inches from each side, shaded bybony protuberances overgrown of the mouth. That mouth had greatyellow fangs and ran from the top to the tally."

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.description: You don't believe in them, and they don't believe in you.

death_watch_beetle.name: Death watch beetle
death_watch_beetle.description: It is a giant beetle that produces a chilling sound.

ogre_shaman.name: Ogre shaman
ogre_shaman.description: It is an ogre wrapped in furs and covered in grotesque body paints.

nexus_quylthulg.name: Nexus quylthulg
nexus_quylthulg.description: It is a very unstable, strange pulsing mound of flesh.

shelob_spider_of_darkness.name: Shelob, Spider of Darkness
shelob_spider_of_darkness.description: Shelob is an enormous bloated spider, rumoured to have been one of thebrood of Ungoliant the Unlight.  Her poison is legendary, as is her ego,which may be her downfall.  She used to guard the pass through CirithUngol, but has not been seen there for many eons.

giant_squid.name: Giant squid
giant_squid.description: Besides being capable of dragging whole ships underwater,this creature can also harm you with ranged attacks.

ghoulking.name: Ghoulking
ghoulking.description: Flesh is falling off in chunks from this decaying abomination.

doombat.name: Doombat
doombat.description: It is a fast moving creature of chaos, a gigantic black batsurrounded by flickering bright red flames.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: A humanoid clothed in black who moves with blinding speed.

memory_moss.name: Memory moss
memory_moss.description: A mass of green vegetation.  You don't remember seeing anything like itbefore.

storm_giant.name: Storm giant
storm_giant.description: It is a twenty-five foot tall giant wreathed in lighting.

spectator.name: Spectator
spectator.description: It has two small eyestalks and a large central eye.

bokrug.name: Bokrug
bokrug.description: A lizard-like Great Old One worshipped by the men of Sarnath.

biclops.name: Biclops
biclops.description: Oh, no! Aaargh! It is the most unnatural, most disgustingcreature imaginable: a two-eyed cyclops! This perversionof nature must be exterminated!

halftroll.name: Half-troll
halftroll.description: A huge, ugly, half-human in search of plunder.

ivory_monk.name: Ivory monk
ivory_monk.description: A monk in white robes.  He is skilled in martial arts.

bert_the_stone_troll.name: Bert the Stone Troll
bert_the_stone_troll.description: Big, brawny, powerful and with a taste for hobbit.  He has friends calledBill and Tom.

bill_the_stone_troll.name: Bill the Stone Troll
bill_the_stone_troll.description: Big, brawny, powerful and with a taste for hobbit.  He has friends calledBert and Tom.

tom_the_stone_troll.name: Tom the Stone Troll
tom_the_stone_troll.description: Big, brawny, powerful and with a taste for hobbit.  He has friends calledBert and Bill.

cave_troll.name: Cave troll
cave_troll.description: He is a vicious monster, feared for his ferocity.

antipaladin.name: Anti-paladin
antipaladin.description: An embodiment of all the cardinal vices, he beholds you scornfully.

logrus_master.name: Logrus master
logrus_master.description: An adept of chaos, feared for his skill of invoking raw Logrus.

barrow_wight.name: Barrow wight
barrow_wight.description: It is a ghostly nightmare of an entity.

giant_skeleton_troll.name: Giant skeleton troll
giant_skeleton_troll.description: It is the animated form of a massive troll.

chaos_drake.name: Chaos drake
chaos_drake.description: A dragon twisted by the forces of chaos.  It seems first ugly, then fair,as its form shimmers and changes in front of your eyes.

law_drake.name: Law drake
law_drake.description: This dragon is clever and cunning.  It laughs at your puny efforts todisturb it.

balance_drake.name: Balance drake
balance_drake.description: A mighty dragon, the balance drake seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance,and despises your feeble efforts to destroy evil.

ethereal_drake.name: Ethereal drake
ethereal_drake.description: A dragon of elemental power, with control over light and dark, theethereal drake's eyes glare with white hatred from the shadows.

groo_the_wanderer.name: Groo the Wanderer
groo_the_wanderer.description: He who laughs at Groo's brains will find there is nothing to laughabout... erm, nobody laughs at Groo and lives.

fasolt_the_giant.name: Fasolt the Giant
fasolt_the_giant.description: Big, brawny, powerful and with a greed for gold.

logrus_ghost.name: Logrus ghost
logrus_ghost.description: An almost life-like creature which is nothing more than a phantomcreated by the Logrus.

spectre.name: Spectre
spectre.description: A phantasmal shrieking spirit.  Its wail drives the intense cold of pureevil deep within your body.

water_troll.name: Water troll
water_troll.description: He is a troll that reeks of brine.

fire_elemental.name: Fire elemental
fire_elemental.description: It is a towering inferno of flames.

cherub.name: Cherub
cherub.description: It is an angel moving very quickly, wielding a holy war hammer and castinga volley of powerful spells in your direction.

water_elemental.name: Water elemental
water_elemental.description: It is a towering tempest of water.

multihued_hound.name: Multi-hued hound
multihued_hound.description: Shimmering in rainbow hues, this hound is beautiful and deadly.

night_stalker.name: Night stalker
night_stalker.description: It is impossible to define its form but its violence is legendary.

carrion_crawler_515.name: Carrion crawler
carrion_crawler_515.description: A hideous centipede covered in slime and with glowing tentacles around itshead.

master_thief.name: Master thief
master_thief.description: Cool and confident, fast and lithe; protect your possessions quickly!

jurt_the_living_trump.name: Jurt the Living Trump
jurt_the_living_trump.description: A magical treatment has turned Jurt, an adept of Logrus,into a Living Trump.

lich.name: Lich
lich.description: It is a skeletal form dressed in robes.  It radiates vastly evil power.

gas_spore.name: Gas spore
gas_spore.description: From a distance, this creature is often mistaken for themuch more dangerous beholder.

master_vampire.name: Master vampire
master_vampire.description: It is a humanoid form dressed in robes.  Power emanates from its chillingframe.

oriental_vampire.name: Oriental vampire
oriental_vampire.description: The oriental vampire is a mist-like creature.

greater_mummy.name: Greater mummy
greater_mummy.description: Once a powerful ruler, now an even more powerful undead menace.

bloodletter_of_khorne.name: Bloodletter of Khorne
bloodletter_of_khorne.description: Slender, red-skinned demons twisting in nightmarish shapes.They are armed with hellblades, which will suck the life fromyour body.

giant_grey_scorpion.name: Giant grey scorpion
giant_grey_scorpion.description: It is a giant grey scorpion.  It looks poisonous.

earth_elemental.name: Earth elemental
earth_elemental.description: It is a towering form composed of rock with fists of awesome power.

air_elemental.name: Air elemental
air_elemental.description: It is a towering tornado of winds.

doom_drake.name: Doom drake
doom_drake.description: Doom drakes are trained firedrakes, always moving in pairs, lookingfor a battle.

gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
gargoyle.description: A weird demon creature with a stone-like skin.

malicious_leprechaun.name: Malicious leprechaun
malicious_leprechaun.description: This little creature has a fiendish gleam in its eyes.

eog_golem.name: Eog golem
eog_golem.description: It is a massive deep brown statue, striding towards you with anall-too-familiar purpose.  Your magic surprisingly feels much lesspowerful now.

little_boy.name: Little Boy
little_boy.description: A shining machine of death and destruction.

dagashi.name: Dagashi
dagashi.description: A human warrior, moving with lightning speed.

headless_ghost.name: Headless ghost
headless_ghost.description: A phantasmal apparition with no head

dread_534.name: Dread
dread_534.description: It is a form that screams its presence against the eye.  Death incarnate,its hideous black body seems to struggle against reality as the universeitself struggles to banish it.

leng_spider.name: Leng spider
leng_spider.description: Bloated purple spiders with long, bristly legs.

star_vampire.name: Star vampire
star_vampire.description: "It was red and dripping; an immensity of pulsing, moving jelly;a scarlet blob with myriad tentacular trunks that waved and waved.There were suckers on the tips of the appendages, and these wereopening and closing with ghoulish lust... the thing was bloated andobscene; a headless, faceless, eyeless bulk, with the ravenous maw andtitanic talons of a star-born monster."

smoke_elemental.name: Smoke elemental
smoke_elemental.description: It is a towering blackened form, crackling with heat.

olog.name: Olog
olog.description: It is a massive intelligent troll with needle sharp fangs.

halfling_slinger.name: Halfling slinger
halfling_slinger.description: A rebel halfling who has rejected the halfling tradition of archery.

gravity_hound.name: Gravity hound
gravity_hound.description: Unfettered by the usual constraints of gravity, these unnatural creaturesare walking on the walls and even the ceiling!  The earth suddenly feelsrather less solid as you see gravity warp all round the monsters.

acidic_cytoplasm.name: Acidic cytoplasm
acidic_cytoplasm.description: A disgusting animated blob of destruction.  Flee its gruesome hunger!

inertia_hound.name: Inertia hound
inertia_hound.description: Bizarrely, this hound seems to be hardly moving at all, yet it approachesyou with deadly menace.  It makes you tired just to look at it.

impact_hound.name: Impact hound
impact_hound.description: A deep brown shape is visible before you, its canine form strikes you withan almost physical force.  The dungeon floor buckles as if struck by apowerful blow as it stalks towards you.

sea_troll.name: Sea troll
sea_troll.description: He is a troll that reeks of brine, close relative to water trolls.

ooze_elemental.name: Ooze elemental
ooze_elemental.description: It is a towering mass of filth, an eyesore of ooze.

young_black_dragon.name: Young black dragon
young_black_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are adarkest black hue.  Acid drips from its body.

mumak_547.name: Mumak
mumak_547.description: A massive elephantine form with eyes twisted by madness.

giant_fire_ant.name: Giant fire ant
giant_fire_ant.description: A giant ant covered in shaggy fur.  Its powerful jaws glow with heat.

mature_white_dragon.name: Mature white dragon
mature_white_dragon.description: A large dragon, scales gleaming bright white.

xorn.name: Xorn
xorn.description: A huge creature of the element Earth.  Able to merge with its element, ithas four huge arms protruding from its enormous torso.

rogrog_the_black_troll.name: Rogrog the Black Troll
rogrog_the_black_troll.description: A massive and cruel troll of great power, drool slides caustically downhis muscular frame.  Despite his bulk, he strikes with stunning speed.

mist_giant.name: Mist giant
mist_giant.description: "Two eyes, the colour of a thin, yellow wine, were set high in thething's body; though it had no separate head. A mouthing, obscene slit,filled with fangs lay just beneath the eyes. It had no nose or ears...Four appendages sprang from its upper parts and its lower bodyslithered along the ground, unsupported by any limbs... incrediblydisgusting to behold and its amorphous body gave off a stench of deathand decay..."

pattern_ghost.name: Pattern ghost
pattern_ghost.description: An almost life-like creature which is nothing more than a phantomcreated by the Pattern.

grey_wraith.name: Grey wraith
grey_wraith.description: A tangible but ghostly form, made of grey fog.  The air around it feelsdeathly cold.

revenant.name: Revenant
revenant.description: Back from the grave, to wreak vengeance upon the living. A gaunt, tall,skeletal figure wearing a ruined plate mail.

young_multihued_dragon.name: Young multi-hued dragon
young_multihued_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Beautiful scales of shimmeringand magical colours cover it.

raals_tome_of_destruction.name: Raal's Tome of Destruction
raals_tome_of_destruction.description: A sentient arcane tome casting spells with malevolent intent.

colossus.name: Colossus
colossus.description: An enormous construct resembling a titan made from stone.  It stridespurposefully towards you, swinging its slow fists with earth-shatteringpower.

young_gold_dragon.name: Young gold dragon
young_gold_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are atarnished gold hue, and light is reflected from its form.

mature_blue_dragon.name: Mature blue dragon
mature_blue_dragon.description: A large dragon, scales tinted deep blue.

mature_green_dragon.name: Mature green dragon
mature_green_dragon.description: A large dragon, scales tinted deep green.

mature_bronze_dragon.name: Mature bronze dragon
mature_bronze_dragon.description: A large dragon with scales of rich bronze.

young_red_dragon.name: Young red dragon
young_red_dragon.description: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are adeepest red hue.  Heat radiates from its form.

nightblade.name: Nightblade
nightblade.description: A dark elven assassin, so stealthy that he is almost impossible to see.

trapper.name: Trapper
trapper.description: This creature traps unsuspecting victimsand paralyzes them, to be slowly digested later.

bodak.name: Bodak
bodak.description: It is a humanoid form composed of flames and hatred.

time_bomb.name: Time bomb
time_bomb.description: It was left here to be used against intruders.

mezzodaemon.name: Mezzodaemon
mezzodaemon.description: An ugly demon with insect-like extremities and large bulbous eyes.

elder_thing.name: Elder thing
elder_thing.description: "...some ridged barrel-shaped objects with thinhorizontal arms radiating spoke-like from a central ring and withvertical knobs or bulbs projecting from the head and base of thebarrel. Each of these knobs was the hub of a system of five long,flat, triangularly tapering arms arranged around it like the armsof a starfish."

ice_elemental.name: Ice elemental
ice_elemental.description: It is a towering glacier of ice.

ipsissimus.name: Ipsissimus
ipsissimus.description: A gaunt figure, clothed in black robes.

the_greater_hell_magic_mushroom_werequyl.name: The Greater hell magic mushroom were-quylthulg
the_greater_hell_magic_mushroom_werequyl.description: This unholy abomination will crush you too. Flee while you can!

lord_borel_of_hendrake.name: Lord Borel of Hendrake
lord_borel_of_hendrake.description: A Lord of Chaos famous for his skill at arms.

chaos_spawn.name: Chaos spawn
chaos_spawn.description: It has two eyestalks and a large central eye. Its gaze can kill.

mummified_troll.name: Mummified troll
mummified_troll.description: It is a massive figure clothed in wrappings.  You are wary of its massivefists.

fire_angel.name: Fire angel
fire_angel.description: It is a fast, deadly dragonoid creature. It was bred and trainedin the Courts of Chaos for assassination.

crypt_thing.name: Crypt thing
crypt_thing.description: It is a skeletal form dressed in robes.It looks evil and devious...

chaos_butterfly.name: Chaos butterfly
chaos_butterfly.description: "It had the appearance of a butterfly, but but a butterfly withwings so huge they blotted out the sun... it had a man's body,covered with hairs or feathers hued like a peacocks..."

time_elemental.name: Time elemental
time_elemental.description: You have not seen it yet.

flying_polyp.name: Flying polyp
flying_polyp.description: "They were only partly material and had the power of aerial motion,despite the absence of wings... Suggestions of monstrous plasticityand of temporary lapses of visibility..."

the_queen_ant.name: The Queen Ant
the_queen_ant.description: She's upset because you hurt her children.

will_o_the_wisp.name: Will o' the wisp
will_o_the_wisp.description: A strange ball of glowing light.  It disappears and reappears and seems todraw you to it.  You seem somehow compelled to stand still and watch itsstrange dancing motion.

shan.name: Shan
shan.description: "Those huge lidless eyes which stared with hate at me, the jointedtendrils which seemed to twist from the head in cosmic rhythms,the ten legs, covered with black shining tentacles and folded intothe pallid underbelly, and the semi-circular ridged wings coveredwith triangular scales -- all this cannot convey the soul-rippinghorror of the shape which darted at me. I saw the three mouthsof the thing move moistly, and then it was upon me."

magma_elemental.name: Magma elemental
magma_elemental.description: It is a towering glowing form of molten hate.

black_pudding.name: Black pudding
black_pudding.description: A lump of rotting black flesh that slurrrrrrrps across the dungeon floor.

killer_iridescent_beetle.name: Killer iridescent beetle
killer_iridescent_beetle.description: It is a giant beetle, whose carapace shimmers with vibrant energies.

nexus_vortex.name: Nexus vortex
nexus_vortex.description: A maelstrom of potent magical energy.

plasma_vortex.name: Plasma vortex
plasma_vortex.description: A whirlpool of intense flame, charring the stones at your feet.

mature_red_dragon.name: Mature red dragon
mature_red_dragon.description: A large dragon, scales tinted deep red.

mature_gold_dragon.name: Mature gold dragon
mature_gold_dragon.description: A large dragon with scales of gleaming gold.

crystal_drake.name: Crystal drake
crystal_drake.description: A dragon of strange crystalline form.  Light shines through it, dazzlingyour eyes with spectrums of colour.

mature_black_dragon.name: Mature black dragon
mature_black_dragon.description: A large dragon, with scales of deepest black.

mature_multihued_dragon.name: Mature multi-hued dragon
mature_multihued_dragon.description: A large dragon, scales shimmering many colours.

sky_whale.name: Sky whale
sky_whale.description: A vastly intelligent whale from the stars.

father_dagon.name: Father Dagon
father_dagon.description: The king of the deep ones. "Vast, Polyphemous-like, and loathsome, itdarted like a stupendous monster of nightmares..."

mother_hydra.name: Mother Hydra
mother_hydra.description: The queen of the deep ones. "Vast, Polyphemous-like, and loathsome, itdarted like a stupendous monster of nightmares..."

death_knight.name: Death knight
death_knight.description: It is a humanoid form dressed in armour of an ancient form.  From beneathits helmet, eyes glow a baleful red and seem to pierce you like lances offire.

mandor_master_of_the_logrus.name: Mandor, Master of the Logrus
mandor_master_of_the_logrus.description: Mandor is one of the greatest Logrus Masters, a formidable magician.

shimmering_vortex.name: Shimmering vortex
shimmering_vortex.description: A strange pillar of shining light that hurts your eyes.  Its shape changesconstantly as it cuts through the air towards you.  It is like a beacon,waking monsters from their slumber.

ancient_blue_dragon.name: Ancient blue dragon
ancient_blue_dragon.description: A huge draconic form.  Lightning crackles along its length.

ancient_bronze_dragon.name: Ancient bronze dragon
ancient_bronze_dragon.description: A huge draconic form enveloped in a cascade of colour.

beholder.name: Beholder
beholder.description: A disembodied eye, surrounded by twelve smaller eyes on stalks.

emperor_wight.name: Emperor wight
emperor_wight.description: Your life force is torn from your body as this powerful unearthly beingapproaches.

seraph.name: Seraph
seraph.description: It is an angel, fast and strong.  You are stunned by its extreme holinessand try to resist all desires to obey it.

loge_spirit_of_fire.name: Loge, Spirit of Fire
loge_spirit_of_fire.description: A towering fire elemental, Loge burns everything beyond recognition.

black_wraith.name: Black wraith
black_wraith.description: A figure that seems made of void, its strangely human shape is cloaked inshadow.  It reaches out at you.

nightgaunt.name: Nightgaunt
nightgaunt.description: "Shocking and uncouth black things with smooth, oily, whale-likesurfaces, unpleasant horns that curved inward toward each other,bat wings whose beating made no sound, ugly prehensile paws, andbarbed tails that lashed needlessly and disquietingly. And worstof all, they never spoke or laughed, and never smiled because theyhad no faces at all to smile with, but only to a suggestiveblankness where a face ought to be."

baron_of_hell.name: Baron of hell
baron_of_hell.description: A minor demon lord with a goat's head, tough to kill.

scylla.name: Scylla
scylla.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with multiple heads dripping venom.

monastic_lich.name: Monastic lich
monastic_lich.description: A skeletal form wrapped in priestly robes.  Before its un-death, itwas a monk in an evil order...

nether_wraith.name: Nether wraith
nether_wraith.description: A form that hurts the eye, death permeates the air around it.  As it nearsyou, a coldness saps your soul.

fire_vampire.name: Fire vampire
fire_vampire.description: It is a living entity of fire. Fire springs up wherever thiscreature touches.

7headed_hydra.name: 7-headed hydra
7headed_hydra.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with seven heads dripping venom.

moire_queen_of_rebma.name: Moire, Queen of Rebma
moire_queen_of_rebma.description: The Queen of the Sea where the Pattern is reflected is a cunningdiplomat and a dangerous foe. "A woman sat upon the throne...and her hair was green, though streaked with silver, and her eyeswere round of moons of jade and her brows rose like the wings ofolive gulls. Her mouth was small, her chin was small; her cheekswere high and wide and rounded. A circlet of white gold crossedher brow and there was a crystal necklace about her neck.
