At itstip there flashed a sapphire between her sweet bare breasts, whosenipples were also bare green. She wore scaled trunks of blue anda silver belt, and she held a scepter of pink coral in her handand had a ring upon every finger, and each ring had a stone ofa different blue within it. She did not smile..."

kavlax_the_manyheaded.name: Kavlax the Many-Headed
kavlax_the_manyheaded.description: A large dragon with a selection of heads, all shouting and arguing as theylook for prey, but each with its own deadly breath weapon.

ancient_white_dragon.name: Ancient white dragon
ancient_white_dragon.description: A huge draconic form.  Frost covers it from head to tail.

ancient_green_dragon.name: Ancient green dragon
ancient_green_dragon.description: A huge draconic form enveloped in clouds of poisonous vapour.

chthonian.name: Chthonian
chthonian.description: "Flowing tentacles and a pulpy gray-black elongated sack of a body...no distinguishing features at all other than the reaching, gropingtentacles. Or was there -- yes! -- a lump in the upper body ofthe thing... a container of sorts for the brain, ganglia, orwhichever diseased organ governed this horror's loathsome life!"

eldrak.name: Eldrak
eldrak.description: A massive troll, larger and stronger than many men together.

ettin.name: Ettin
ettin.description: A massive troll of huge strength.  Ettins are stupid but violent.

night_mare.name: Night mare
night_mare.description: A fearsome skeletal horse with glowing eyes, that watch you with littlemore than a hatred of all that lives. Flying hooves don't touch theground...

vampire_lord.name: Vampire lord
vampire_lord.description: A foul wind chills your bones as this ghastly figure approaches.

ancient_black_dragon.name: Ancient black dragon
ancient_black_dragon.description: A huge draconic form.  Pools of acid melt the floor around it.

weird_fume.name: Weird fume
weird_fume.description: A swirling spiral of mist, constantly changing its appearance.

spawn_of_ubbosathla.name: Spawn of Ubbo-Sathla
spawn_of_ubbosathla.description: Weird, jelly like creatures. No two look the same.

fat_man.name: Fat Man
fat_man.description: A shining machine of death and destruction.

malekith_the_accursed.name: Malekith the Accursed
malekith_the_accursed.description: One of the oldest and most powerful dark elves, Malekith is a mastersorcerer devoted to evil. The left side of his face is pale, the otherone is dark. His hair is long and white.

morgenstern_julians_steed.name: Morgenstern, Julian's steed
morgenstern_julians_steed.description: Morgenstern is tougher and faster than any other horse: "Morgensternwas six hands higher than any other horse I had ever seen, and hiseyes were the dead color of a Weimaraner dog's and his coat was allgray and his hooves looked like polished steel. He raced along likethe wind..."

spirit_troll.name: Spirit troll
spirit_troll.description: A weird troll from the elemental planes.

war_troll.name: War troll
war_troll.description: A massive troll, equipped with a scimitar and heavy armour.

disenchanter_worm_mass.name: Disenchanter worm mass
disenchanter_worm_mass.description: It is a strange mass of squirming worms.  Magical energy cracklesaround its disgusting form.

rotting_quylthulg.name: Rotting quylthulg
rotting_quylthulg.description: It is a pulsing flesh mound that reeks of death and putrefaction.

lesser_titan.name: Lesser titan
lesser_titan.description: It is a humanoid figure thirty feet tall that gives off an aura of powerand hate.

9headed_hydra.name: 9-headed hydra
9headed_hydra.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with nine smouldering heads.

enchantress.name: Enchantress
enchantress.description: This elusive female spellcaster has a special affinity for dragons, whomshe rarely fights without.

archpriest.name: Archpriest
archpriest.description: An evil priest, dressed all in black.  Deadly spells hit you at analarming rate as his black spiked mace rains down blow after blow on yourpitiful frame.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: A human figure in robes, he moves with magically improved speed, and hishands are ablur with spell casting.

xaren.name: Xaren
xaren.description: It is a tougher relative of the Xorn.  Its hide glitters with metal ores.

jubjub_bird.name: Jubjub bird
jubjub_bird.description: A vast legendary bird, its iron talons rake the most impenetrable ofsurfaces and its screech echoes through the many winding dungeon corridors.

minotaur.name: Minotaur
minotaur.description: It is a cross between a human and a bull.

jasra_brands_mistress.name: Jasra, Brand's Mistress
jasra_brands_mistress.description: Brand's one-time mistress.  Her face could sink a thousandships, but Brand is not too selective.

death_drake.name: Death drake
death_drake.description: It is a dragon-like form wrapped in darkness.  You cannot make out itstrue form but you sense its evil.

ancient_red_dragon.name: Ancient red dragon
ancient_red_dragon.description: A huge draconic form.  Wisps of smoke steam from its nostrils and theextreme heat surrounding it makes you gasp for breath.

ancient_gold_dragon.name: Ancient gold dragon
ancient_gold_dragon.description: A huge draconic form wreathed in a nimbus of light.

great_crystal_drake.name: Great crystal drake
great_crystal_drake.description: A huge crystalline dragon.  Its claws could cut you to shreds and itsteeth are razor sharp.  Strange colours ripple through it as it moves inthe light.

wyrd_sister.name: Wyrd sister
wyrd_sister.description: This old crone is rumoured to be a witch of chaos... but you don'treally believe in witches, do you?

clubber_demon.name: Clubber demon
clubber_demon.description: It is a demon swinging wildly with two clubs.

death_quasit.name: Death quasit
death_quasit.description: It is a demon of small stature, but its armoured frame moves withlightning speed and its powers make it a tornado of death and destruction.

giganto_the_gargantuan.name: Giganto the Gargantuan
giganto_the_gargantuan.description: A gargantuan mutant whale, who has grown legs that enable it to walkon dry land as well.

strygalldwir.name: Strygalldwir
strygalldwir.description: A demon from the Courts of Chaos.  According to Corwin,'it was well over six feet in height, with great branches of antlersgrowing out of its forehead.  Nude, its flesh was a uniform ash-grayin color.  It appeared to be sexless, and it had gray, leathery wingsextending far out behind it'.

fallen_angel.name: Fallen angel
fallen_angel.description: An angelic being who was mighty once but dared defy the Omnipotentto arms.

giant_headless.name: Giant headless
giant_headless.description: Giant headless humanoid abominations created by a magical mutation.

judge_fire.name: Judge Fire
judge_fire.description: One of the Dark Judges, he has come to punish your crime of living.He looks like a skeleton enveloped in flames.

ubbosathla_the_unbegotten_source.name: Ubbo-Sathla, the Unbegotten Source
ubbosathla_the_unbegotten_source.description: "There, in the gray beginning of Earth, the formless mass that wasUbbo-Sathla reposed amid the slime and the vapors. Headless,without organs or members..."

judge_mortis.name: Judge Mortis
judge_mortis.description: Another Dark Judge, he is a rotting humanoid with a cow's skull ashis head.

dark_elven_sorceror.name: Dark elven sorceror
dark_elven_sorceror.description: A dark elven figure, dressed in deepest black.  Power seems to cracklefrom his slender frame.

master_lich.name: Master lich
master_lich.description: A skeletal form wrapped in robes.  Powerful magic crackles along its bonyfingers.

byakhee.name: Byakhee
byakhee.description: "There flapped rhythmically a horde of tame, trained, hybridwinged things... not altogether crows, nor moles, nor buzzards,nor ants, nor decomposed human beings, but something I cannotand must not recall."

rinaldo_son_of_brand.name: Rinaldo, son of Brand
rinaldo_son_of_brand.description: The madman's son is a Logrus Master, almost as great amenace as his father.

archon.name: Archon
archon.description: Never a more heavenly being have you seen.  The very holiness of itspresence makes you deeply respect it.  Few creatures can match the powersof an Archon; fewer still live to tell the tale after attacking one.

formless_spawn_of_tsathoggua.name: Formless spawn of Tsathoggua
formless_spawn_of_tsathoggua.description: "...living things that oozed along stone channels...But they were not toads like Tsathoggua himself. Far worse --they were amorphous lumps of viscous black slime that tooktemporary shapes for various purposes."

hunting_horror.name: Hunting horror
hunting_horror.description: "And in the air there were great viperine creatures,which had curiously distorted heads, and grotesquely greatclawed appendages, supporting themselves with ease by the aidof black rubbery wings of singularly monstrous dimensions."

undead_beholder.name: Undead beholder
undead_beholder.description: A disembodied eye, floating in the air.  Black nether storms rage aroundits bloodshot pupil and light seems to bend as it sucks its power from thevery air around it.  Your soul chills as it drains your vitality for itsevil enchantments.

shadow_demon.name: Shadow demon
shadow_demon.description: A mighty spirit of darkness of vaguely humanoid form.  Razor-edged clawsreach out to end your life as it glides towards you, seeking to suck theenergy from your soul to feed its power.

iron_lich.name: Iron lich
iron_lich.description: It is a huge, twisted grey skull floating through the air. Its cold eyesburn with hatred towards all who live.

dread_667.name: Dread
dread_667.description: It is a form that screams its presence against the eye.  Death incarnate,its hideous black body seems to struggle against reality as the universeitself struggles to banish it.

greater_basilisk.name: Greater basilisk
greater_basilisk.description: A large basilisk, whose shape resembles that of a great wyrm.

charybdis.name: Charybdis
charybdis.description: A monstrous dweller of the depths; its hungry maw has been the doomof innumerable sailors!

jack_of_shadows.name: Jack of Shadows
jack_of_shadows.description: Deriving his strength from the shadows, this king of thievessteals only for the challenge.

zephyr_lord.name: Zephyr Lord
zephyr_lord.description: An undead master of the vicious Zephyr hounds.

juggernaut_of_khorne.name: Juggernaut of Khorne
juggernaut_of_khorne.description: A great, vicious beast whose flesh is made of steel and whoseblood is fire. It charges at you ignoring everything else.

mumak_673.name: Mumak
mumak_673.description: A massive elephantine form with eyes twisted by madness.

judge_fear.name: Judge Fear
judge_fear.description: A Dark Judge, reputedly so frightening that his gaze can kill.

ancient_multihued_dragon.name: Ancient multi-hued dragon
ancient_multihued_dragon.description: A huge draconic form.  Many colours ripple down its massive frame.  Fewlive to see another.

ethereal_dragon.name: Ethereal dragon
ethereal_dragon.description: A huge dragon emanating from the elemental plains, the ethereal dragon isa master of light and dark.  Its form disappears from sight as it cloaksitself in unearthly shadows.

dark_young_of_shubniggurath.name: Dark young of Shub-Niggurath
dark_young_of_shubniggurath.description: "Something black in the road, something that wasn't a tree.Something big and black and ropy, just squatting there, waiting,with ropy arms squirming and reaching... It came crawling up thehillside... and it was the black thing of my dreams... that black,ropy, slimy jelly tree-thing out of the woods. It crawled up and itflowed up on its hoofs and mouths and snaky arms."

colour_out_of_space.name: Colour out of space
colour_out_of_space.description: "The shaft of phosphorescence from the well... was no longer shiningout, it was pouring out; and as the shapeless stream of unplaceablecolour left the well it seemed to flow directly into the sky."

quaker_master_of_earth.name: Quaker, Master of Earth
quaker_master_of_earth.description: A towering stone elemental stands before you.  The walls and ceiling arereduced to rubble as Quaker advances.

death_leprechaun.name: Death leprechaun
death_leprechaun.description: Nasty undead little creatures.  They are chanting the name of thesinister wizard who created them: 'Bruce! Bruce..!'

chaugnar_faugn_horror_from_the_hills.name: Chaugnar Faugn, Horror from the Hills
chaugnar_faugn_horror_from_the_hills.description: "The ears were webbed and tentacled, the trunk terminated ina huge flaring disk at least a foot in diameter... Its forelimbswere bent stiffly at the elbow, and its hands... rested palmsupward on its lap."

lloigor.name: Lloigor
lloigor.description: "Invisible ones from the stars... They sometimes took forms...but existed as vortices of power in their natural state."

utgardloke.name: Utgard-Loke
utgardloke.description: A frost giant chieftain, unusually smart for a giant.

quachil_uttaus_treader_of_the_dust.name: Quachil Uttaus, Treader of the Dust
quachil_uttaus_treader_of_the_dust.description: "It was a figure no larger than a young child, but sere andshriveled as some millenial mummy. Its hairless head, itsunfeatured face, borne on a neck of skeleton thinness, werelined with a thousand reticulated wrinkles. The body was likethat of some monstrous, withered abortion that had never drawnbreath. The pipy arms, ending in bony claws, were outhrust as ifankylosed in posture of an eternal dreadful groping."

shoggoth.name: Shoggoth
shoggoth.description: "The nightmare, plastic column of fetid, black iridescence oozedtightly onward... A shapeless congerie of protoplasmic bubbles,faintly self-luminous and with myriads of temporary eyes formingand unforming as pustules of greenish light all over thetunnel-filling front that bore down upon us, crushing the franticpenguins and slithering over glistening floor that it and itskind had swept so evilly free of all litter. Still came that eldritchmocking cry -- 'Tekeli-li! Tekeli-li!'"

judge_death.name: Judge Death
judge_death.description: The most powerful Dark Judge, whose touch means death.

ariel_queen_of_air.name: Ariel, Queen of Air
ariel_queen_of_air.description: A towering air elemental, Ariel, the sorceress, avoids your blowswith her extreme speed.

11headed_hydra.name: 11-headed hydra
11headed_hydra.description: A strange reptilian hybrid with eleven smouldering heads.

high_priest.name: High priest
high_priest.description: A dark priest of the highest order.  Powerful and evil, beware his manyspells.

dreadmaster.name: Dreadmaster
dreadmaster.description: It is an unlife of power almost unequaled.  An affront to existence, itsvery touch abuses and disrupts the flow of life, and its unearthly limbs,of purest black, crush rock and flesh with ease.

drolem.name: Drolem
drolem.description: A constructed dragon, the drolem has massive strength.  Powerful spellsweaved during its creation make it a fearsome adversary.  Its eyes showlittle intelligence, but it has been instructed to destroy all it meets.

scatha_the_worm.name: Scatha the Worm
scatha_the_worm.description: An ancient and wise Dragon.  Scatha has grown clever over the long years.His scales are covered with frost, and his breath sends a shower of iceinto the air.

warrior_of_the_dawn.name: Warrior of the Dawn
warrior_of_the_dawn.description: Fierce, barbaric warriors, armed with great spiked clubs, and surroundedin an aura of scarlet. Whenever one of them is slain, another appearsout of nowhere to take his place.

lesser_black_reaver.name: Lesser black reaver
lesser_black_reaver.description: A humanoid form, black as night, advancing steadily and unstoppably.

zothommog.name: Zoth-Ommog
zothommog.description: "A body shaped like a road-based, truncated cone. A flat, blunt,wedge-shaped, vaguely reptilian head surmounts this conical torso,and the head is almost entirely hidden behind swirling tresses.This hair, or beard and mane, consists of thickly carved andcoiling ropes, like serpents or worms... Through this repulsiveMedusa-mane of ropy tendrils, two fierce, serpent-like eyesglare in a horrible intermingling of cold, inhuman mockery andwhat I can only describe as gloating menace."

nazgul.name: Nazgul
nazgul.description: A tall black cloaked Ringwraith, radiating an aura of fear.

smaug_the_golden.name: Smaug the Golden
smaug_the_golden.description: Smaug is one of the Uruloki that still survive, a fire-drake of immensecunning and intelligence.  His speed through air is matched by few otherdragons and his dragonfire is what legends are made of.

the_stormbringer.name: The Stormbringer
the_stormbringer.description: The mightiest of hellblades, a black runesword which thirsts foryour soul.

ultraelite_paladin.name: Ultra-elite paladin
ultraelite_paladin.description: Fighting for a good cause, and they consider you an agent of the devil.

leprechaun_fanatic.name: Leprechaun fanatic
leprechaun_fanatic.description: These leprechauns are not afraid to die for their cause. They arecarrying explosives and making terrorist strikes...

dracolich.name: Dracolich
dracolich.description: The skeletal form of a once-great dragon, enchanted by magic mostperilous.  Its animated form strikes with speed and drains life from itsprey to satisfy its hunger.

greater_titan.name: Greater titan
greater_titan.description: A forty foot tall humanoid that shakes the ground as it walks.  The powerradiating from its frame shakes your courage, its hatred inspired by yourdefiance.

dracolisk.name: Dracolisk
dracolisk.description: A mixture of dragon and basilisk, the dracolisk stares at you with deeppiercing eyes, its evil breath burning the ground where it stands.

fastitocalon.name: Fastitocalon
fastitocalon.description: A huge aquatic dragon, its shell is as large as a small island. Somehave called this creature a dragon-turtle.

spectral_tyrannosaurus.name: Spectral tyrannosaurus
spectral_tyrannosaurus.description: A deadly undead horror which looks like a skeletal tyrannosaurussurrounded by a sickly green glow.

yibbtstll_the_patient_one.name: Yibb-Tstll the Patient One
yibbtstll_the_patient_one.description: "There, about the pulsating body of the Ancient One, hugelywinged reptilian creatures without faces cluttered and clutchedat a multitude of blackly writhing, pendulous breasts! (Its eyes)moved quickly, independently -- sliding with vile viscosity overthe whole rotten surface of Yib-Tstll's pulpy, glistening head!"

ghatanothoa.name: Ghatanothoa
ghatanothoa.description: The chief among the creatures known as Lloigor. Ghatanothoa hasassumed a shape which is too horrible to describe: "Nothing I could saycould even adumbrate the loathsome, unholy, non-human, extra-galactichorror and hatefulness and unutterabl evil of that forbidden spawnof black chaos, and illimitable night."

ent.name: Ent
ent.description: A treeherd; a sentient, moving tree. Its wrath is fearsome!

hru.name: Hru
hru.description: A rock giant, a being made of living stone.

itangast_the_fire_drake.name: Itangast the Fire Drake
itangast_the_fire_drake.description: A mighty ancient dragon, Itangast's form scorches your flesh.  Wisps ofsmoke curl up from his nostrils as he regards you with disdain.

death_mold.name: Death mold
death_mold.description: It is the epitome of all that is evil, in a mold.  Its lifeless form drawspower from sucking the souls of those that approach it, a nimbus of pureevil surrounds it.  Luckily for you, it can't move.

fafner_the_dragon.name: Fafner the Dragon
fafner_the_dragon.description: The mighty dragon of the Norse myth, Fafner was a giant who slew hisbrother to win a treasure hoard, and then transformed himself intoa dragon, greedily watching over his hoard.

fangorn.name: Fangorn
fangorn.description: The oldest of all ents, a respected and feared ancient creature.

zhar_the_twin_obscenity.name: Zhar the Twin Obscenity
zhar_the_twin_obscenity.description: "The thing that crouched in the weird green dusk was a living massof shuddering horror, a ghastly mountain of sensate, quiveringflesh, whose tentacles, far-flung in the dim reaches of thesubterranean cavern, emitted a strange humming sound, while fromthe depths of the creature's body came a weird and horrificundulation."

glaurung_father_of_the_dragons.name: Glaurung, Father of the Dragons
glaurung_father_of_the_dragons.description: Glaurung is the father of all dragons, and was for a long time the mostpowerful.  Nevertheless, he still has full command over his brood and cancommand them to appear whenever he so wishes.  He is the definition ofdragonfire.

behemoth.name: Behemoth
behemoth.description: A great water-beast, with an almost unpenetrable skin.

garm_guardian_of_hel.name: Garm, Guardian of Hel
garm_guardian_of_hel.description: Garm is a gigantic hound, whose job is to guard that none escapesthe tortures of Hel, the Norse place of punishment for the wickedand cowardly dead.

greater_wall_monster.name: Greater wall monster
greater_wall_monster.description: A sentient, moving section of wall.

nycadaemon.name: Nycadaemon
nycadaemon.description: A loathsome, sturdy, winged, horned demon, with talons that could teara stone wall down.

balrog.name: Balrog
balrog.description: It is a massive humanoid demon wreathed in flames.

goat_of_mendes.name: Goat of Mendes
goat_of_mendes.description: It is a demonic creature from the lowest hell, vaguely resembling alarge black he-goat.

nightwing.name: Nightwing
nightwing.description: Everywhere colours seem paler and the air chiller.  At the centre of thecold stands a mighty figure.  Its wings envelop you in the chill of deathas the nightwing reaches out to draw you into oblivion.  Your muscles sagand your mind loses all will to fight as you stand in awe of this mightybeing.

maulotaur.name: Maulotaur
maulotaur.description: It is a belligrent minotaur with some destructive magical arsenal, armedwith a hammer.

nether_hound.name: Nether hound
nether_hound.description: You feel a soul-tearing chill upon viewing this beast, a ghostly form ofdarkness in the shape of a large dog.

time_hound.name: Time hound
time_hound.description: You get a terrible sense of deja vu, or is it a premonition?  All at onceyou see a little puppy and a toothless old dog.  Perhaps you should giveup and go to bed.

plasma_hound.name: Plasma hound
plasma_hound.description: The very air warps as pure elemental energy stalks towards you in theshape of a giant hound.  Your hair stands on end and your palms itch asyou sense trouble.

demonic_quylthulg.name: Demonic quylthulg
demonic_quylthulg.description: A pile of pulsing flesh that glows with an inner hellish fire.  The worlditself seems to cry out against it.

great_storm_wyrm.name: Great storm wyrm
great_storm_wyrm.description: A vast dragon of power.  Storms and lightning crash around its titanicform.  Deep blue scales reflect the flashes and highlight the creature'sgreat muscles.  It regards you with contempt.

ulik_the_troll.name: Ulik the Troll
ulik_the_troll.description: Ulik is the strongest troll who has ever lived. He could challengethe immortals and pound them to dust with his great strength.

baphomet_the_minotaur_lord.name: Baphomet the Minotaur Lord
baphomet_the_minotaur_lord.description: A fearsome bull-headed demon, Baphomet swings a mighty axe as he cursesall that defy him.

hell_knight.name: Hell knight
hell_knight.description: It is a humanoid form dressed in armour of ancient style.  From beneathits helmet, eyes glow with hellfire.

bull_gates.name: Bull Gates
bull_gates.description: He may not code worth a dime, but he certainly knows how to make money.

santa_claus.name: Santa Claus
santa_claus.description: Why would anybody want to kill Santa Claus? To get all the presents,of course!

eihort_the_thing_in_the_labyrinth.name: Eihort, the Thing in the Labyrinth
eihort_the_thing_in_the_labyrinth.description: "Then came pale movement in the well, and something clamberedup from the dark, a bloated blanched oval supported on myriadfleshless legs. Eyes formed in the gelatinous oval and staredat him."

the_king_in_yellow.name: The King in Yellow
the_king_in_yellow.description: The King in Yellow is an Avatar of Hastur: "He has noface, and is twice as tall as a man. He wears pointed shoes underhis tattered, fantastically colored robes, and a streamer of silkappears to fall from the pointed tip of his hood. At times he appearsto be winged; at others, haloed."

great_unclean_one.name: Great unclean one
great_unclean_one.description: This disgusting demon resembles a shambling pile of rottinggreen flesh, with dozens of mouths drooling and leaving atrail of foul-smelling goo behind. Nurgle must beproud of himself for having created this atrocity!

lord_of_chaos.name: Lord of Chaos
lord_of_chaos.description: He is one of the few true masters of the art, being extremely skillful inall forms of unarmed combat and controlling the Logruswith disdainful ease.

khamul_the_easterling.name: Khamul the Easterling
khamul_the_easterling.description: A warrior-king of the East.  Khamul is a powerful opponent, his skill incombat awesome and his form twisted by evil cunning.

hound_of_tindalos.name: Hound of Tindalos
hound_of_tindalos.description: "They are lean and athirst!... All the evil in the universewas concentrated in their lean, hungry bodies. Or had theybodies? I saw them only for a moment, I cannot be certain."

lesser_kraken.name: Lesser kraken
lesser_kraken.description: An enormously fearsome and powerful inhabitant of the depths. Itresembles a gargantuan octopus and its evil is almost tangible.

great_ice_wyrm.name: Great ice wyrm
great_ice_wyrm.description: An immense dragon capable of awesome destruction.  You have never feltsuch extreme cold, or witnessed such an icy stare.  Begone quickly or feelits wrath!

demilich.name: Demilich
demilich.description: A lich who is partially immaterial, on its way to a new, ethereal form.

the_phoenix.name: The Phoenix
the_phoenix.description: A massive glowing eagle bathed in flames.  The searing heat chars yourskin and melts your armour.

nightcrawler.name: Nightcrawler
nightcrawler.description: This intensely evil creature bears the form of a gargantuan black worm.Its gaping maw is a void of blackness, acid drips from its steely hide.It is like nothing you have ever seen before, and a terrible chill runsdown your spine as you face it.

lord_of_change.name: Lord of Change
lord_of_change.description: The most powerful of Tzeentch's servitors. This demon looks likea huge bird-creature, with the head of a predatory bird andfantastically multi-coloured wings.

keeper_of_secrets.name: Keeper of Secrets
keeper_of_secrets.description: This demonic keeper of forbidden secrets looks like a hairlessminotaur with extra arms, decorated with tattoos and nose rings.It is the embodiment of Slaanesh's perverted magic.

shudde_mell.name: Shudde M'ell
shudde_mell.description: The most powerful and most evil of all Chthonians."A great gray thing a mile long chanting and exuding strange acids...charging through the depths of the earth at a fantastic speed, in adreadful fury... melting basaltic rocks like butter under a blowtorch."

hand_druj.name: Hand druj
hand_druj.description: A skeletal hand floating in the air, motionless except for its flexingfingers.

eye_druj.name: Eye druj
eye_druj.description: A bloodshot eyeball floating in the air, you'd be forgiven for assuming itharmless.

skull_druj.name: Skull druj
skull_druj.description: A glowing skull possessed by sorcerous power.  It need not move, butmerely blast you with mighty magic.

aether_vortex.name: Aether vortex
aether_vortex.description: An awesome vortex of pure magic, power radiates from its frame.

nidhogg_the_heldrake.name: Nidhogg the Hel-Drake
nidhogg_the_heldrake.description: In the bowels of Hel, the dread Nidhogg, a dragon blacker than thenight, feasts on the essences of the dead.

the_lernean_hydra.name: The Lernean Hydra
the_lernean_hydra.description: A massive legendary hydra.  It has twelve powerful heads.  Its many eyesstare at you as clouds of smoke and poisonous vapour rise from itsseething form.

thuringwethil.name: Thuringwethil
thuringwethil.description: Chief messenger between Sauron and Morgoth, she is surely the most deadlyof her vampire race.  At first she is charming to meet, but her wings andeyes give away her true form.

great_hell_wyrm.name: Great hell wyrm
great_hell_wyrm.description: A vast dragon of immense power.  Fire leaps continuously from its hugeform.  The air around it scalds you.  Its slightest glance burns you, andyou truly realize how insignificant you are.

hastur_the_unspeakable.name: Hastur the Unspeakable
hastur_the_unspeakable.description: Its form is partially that of areptile, partially that of a gigantic octopus. It will destroy you.

bloodthirster.name: Bloodthirster
bloodthirster.description: Khorne's mightiest servant, a winged hound-demon walking ontwo paws and wielding a mighty axe and a whip in the othertwo. Intelligent, bloodthirsty eyes behold you from insidethe bloody demon armour.

draconic_quylthulg.name: Draconic quylthulg
draconic_quylthulg.description: It looks like it was once a dragon corpse, now deeply infected withmagical bacteria that make it pulse in a foul and degrading way.

nyogtha_the_thing_that_should_not_be.name: Nyogtha, the Thing that Should not Be
nyogtha_the_thing_that_should_not_be.description: "...a little finger of blackness crept out from beneath its edgea great wave of iridescent blackness, neither liquid nor solid,a frightful gelatinous mass."

ahtu_avatar_of_nyarlathotep.name: Ahtu, Avatar of Nyarlathotep
ahtu_avatar_of_nyarlathotep.description: "Higher already than the giants of the forest ringing it, thefifty-foot-thick column... sprouted a ring of tendrils, ruddy andgolden and glittering overall with inclusions of quartz."

fundin_bluecloak.name: Fundin Bluecloak
fundin_bluecloak.description: He is one of the greatest dwarven priests to walk the earth.  Fundin hasearned a high position in the church, and his skill with both weapon andspell only justify his position further.  His combination of both dwarvenstrength and priestly wisdom are a true match for any adventurer.

dworkin_barimen.name: Dworkin Barimen
dworkin_barimen.description: Once this now gnomish creature created the universe with the Jewelof Judgement - or so you have been told. There is little sanity leftin his present form even if he still has the power. "He was a smallman. Tiny, might be an even better word. He was around five feet talland a hunchback. His hair and beard were as heavy as (Corwin's). Theonly distinguishing features in that great mass of fur werehis long, hook nose and his almost black eyes, now squintedagainst the light... Dworkin: 'I am Oberon's prisoner.' Corwin:'Oh? None of us knew that Dad had locked you up.' (Corwin) heard(Dworkin) weeping. 'Yes,' he said after a long time. 'He didn'ttrust me.' 'Why not?' 'I told him I'd thought of a way todestroy Amber. I described it to him, and he locked me in.'"

uriel_angel_of_fire.name: Uriel, Angel of Fire
uriel_angel_of_fire.description: A creature of godly appearance, you dare not challenge Uriel's supremacy.Those who stood against him before are but a memory, cremated by hismastery of elemental fire.

azriel_angel_of_death.name: Azriel, Angel of Death
azriel_angel_of_death.description: Azriel commands awesome power, his visage holy enough to shrivel yoursoul.  You shriek with disbelief as his mastery of death draws you to yourgrave.  It is truly beyond all but the mightiest of warriors to standagainst him and live.

ancalagon_the_black.name: Ancalagon the Black
ancalagon_the_black.description: 'Rushing Jaws' is his name, and death is his game.  No dragon of the broodof Glaurung can match him.

daoloth_the_render_of_the_veils.name: Daoloth, the Render of the Veils
daoloth_the_render_of_the_veils.description: "Not shapeless, but so complex that the eye could recognize nodescribable shape. There were hemispheres and shining metal,coupled by long plastic rods. The rods were of a flat gray color,so that he could not make out which were nearer; they merged intoa flat mass from which protruded individual cylinders. As he lookedat it, he had a curious feeling that eyes gleamed from betweenthese rods; but wherever he glanced at the construction, he sawonly the spaces between them."

nightwalker.name: Nightwalker
nightwalker.description: A huge giant garbed in black, more massive than a titan and stronger thana dragon.  With terrible blows, it breaks your armour from your back,leaving you defenseless against its evil wrath.  It can smell your fear,and you in turn smell the awful stench of death as this ghastly figurestrides towards you menacingly.

raphael_the_messenger.name: Raphael, the Messenger
raphael_the_messenger.description: Commanding a legion of angels, Raphael will destroy you for your sins.  Hewill crush you like the pitiful insignificant being he sees you to be.Your very soul will be taken into judgement by his supreme authority as hecleanses the world of evil.

artsi_the_champion_of_chaos.name: Artsi the Champion of Chaos
artsi_the_champion_of_chaos.description: He is one of the greatest warriors of chaos to walk the earth.His bloody blade has slain thousands and tens of thousands, and stillhungers for more.

saruman_of_many_colours.name: Saruman of Many Colours
saruman_of_many_colours.description: Originally known as the White, Saruman fell prey to Sauron's wiles. Hesearches forever for the One Ring, to become a mighty Sorcerer-King of theworld.

gandalf_the_grey.name: Gandalf the Grey
gandalf_the_grey.description: The wizard who opposed Saruman, and in the end, was the onlyone of the Istari to succeed in his task. Gandalf is verywise and specializes in fire magic.

brand_mad_visionary_of_amber.name: Brand, Mad Visionary of Amber
brand_mad_visionary_of_amber.description: Brand sees himself as a hero, the god creatorand absolute monarch of a future world. Unfortunately he needsto erase the existing world to make his new world. "...a figure bothlike Bleys and (Corwin). (Corwin's) features, though smaller, his eyes,Bleys' hair, beardless. He wore a riding suit of green and sat atop a whitehorse... There was a quality of both strength and weakness, questing andabandonment about him."

shadowlord.name: Shadowlord
shadowlord.description: An aura of hatred, cowardice and falsehood surrounds you as thiscloaked figure floats towards you.

greater_kraken.name: Greater kraken
greater_kraken.description: An enormously fearsome and powerful inhabitant of the depths. Itresembles a gargantuan octopus and its evil is almost tangible.

archlich.name: Archlich
archlich.description: A lich who has reached its ultimate evolutionary stage: a completelyimmaterial state.

bast_goddess_of_cats.name: Bast, Goddess of Cats
bast_goddess_of_cats.description: "Beauty -- coolness -- aloofness -- philosophical repose --self-sufficiency -- untamed mastery -- what else can we findthese things with even half the perfection and completenessthat mark their incarnation in the peerless and softly glidingcat?"

jabberwock.name: Jabberwock
jabberwock.description: "Beware the Jabberwock, my son! The jaws that bite, the claws that catch!"

chaos_hound.name: Chaos hound
chaos_hound.description: A constantly changing canine form, this hound rushes towards you as ifexpecting mayhem and chaos ahead.  It appears to have an almost kamikazerelish for combat.  You suspect all may not be as it seems.

vlad_dracula_prince_of_darkness.name: Vlad Dracula, Prince of Darkness
vlad_dracula_prince_of_darkness.description: The most feared of all vampires, the Prince of Darkness himself.

ultimate_beholder.name: Ultimate beholder
ultimate_beholder.description: A disembodied eye, surrounded by twelve smaller eyes on stalks.This is a beholder hive-mother, far more powerful than normalbeholders.

great_wyrm_of_chaos.name: Great Wyrm of Chaos
great_wyrm_of_chaos.description: A massive dragon of changing form.  As you watch, it appears first fairand then foul.  Its body is twisted by chaotic forces as it strives tostay real.  Its very existence distorts the universe around it.

great_wyrm_of_law.name: Great Wyrm of Law
great_wyrm_of_law.description: A massive dragon of powerful intellect.  It seeks to dominate the universeand despises all other life.  It sees all who do not obey it as mereinsects to be crushed underfoot.

great_wyrm_of_balance.name: Great Wyrm of Balance
great_wyrm_of_balance.description: A massive dragon, it is thousands ofyears old and seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance.  It sees you as anupstart troublemaker without the wisdom to control your actions.

shambler.name: Shambler
shambler.description: This elemental creature is power incarnate; it looks like a huge polar bearwith a huge gaping maw instead of a head.

hypnos_lord_of_sleep.name: Hypnos, Lord of Sleep
hypnos_lord_of_sleep.description: "Young with the youth that is outside time, and with a beauteousbearded face, curved, smiling lips, Olympian brow; and dense lockswaving and poppy-crowned."

glaaki.name: Glaaki
glaaki.description: "From an oval body protruded countless thin, pointed spines ofmulti-colored metal; at the more rounded end of the oval acircular, thick-lipped mouth formed the center of a spongyface, from which rose three yellow eyes on thin stalks. Aroundthe underside of the body were many white pyramids, presumablyused for locomotion. The diameter of the body must have beenat least ten feet at its least wide..."

bleys_master_of_manipulation.name: Bleys, Master of Manipulation
bleys_master_of_manipulation.description: This cunning Amberite is the master of subtle ploys. "...a fiery bearded,flame-crowned man, dressed all in red and orange, mainly of silk stuff,and he held a sword in his right hand and a glass of wine in his left,and the devil himself danced behind his eyes... His chin was light, but thebeard covered it. His sword was inlaid with an elaborate filigree of agolden color. He wore two huge rings on his right hand and one on hisleft: an emerald, a ruby, and a sapphire, respectively."

great_wyrm_of_many_colours.name: Great Wyrm of Many Colours
great_wyrm_of_many_colours.description: A huge dragon whose scales shimmer in myriad hues.

fiona_the_sorceress.name: Fiona the Sorceress
fiona_the_sorceress.description: She is beautiful and deadly. "...I have always been very fond of Fiona.She is certainly the loveliest, most civilized of (all Amberites)."

tselakus_the_dreadlord.name: Tselakus, the Dreadlord
tselakus_the_dreadlord.description: This huge affront to existence twists and tears at the fabric of space.Darkness itself recoils from the touch of Tselakus as he leaves a trailof death and destruction. Mighty claws rend reality as heannihilates all in his path to your soul!

sky_drake.name: Sky Drake
sky_drake.description: The mightiest elemental dragon of air, it can destroy you with ease.

julian_master_of_arden_forest.name: Julian, Master of Arden Forest
julian_master_of_arden_forest.description: Julian is at home in wild woodlands. He enjoys hunting a challengingprey: you. "Julian, dark hair hanging long, blue eyes containing neitherpassion nor compassion. He was dressed completely in scaled white armor,not silver or metallic-colored, but looking as if it had been enameled."

tiamat_celestial_dragon_of_evil.name: Tiamat, Celestial Dragon of Evil
tiamat_celestial_dragon_of_evil.description: Usually found guarding the first plane of Hell, Tiamat is a formidableopponent, her five heads breathing death to all who stand against her.

the_norsa.name: The Norsa
the_norsa.description: An elephantine horror with five trunks, each capable of breathingdestructive blasts of elements. It is said that it is better toface the fury of a thousand raging lions than the Norsa!

rhantegoth.name: Rhan-Tegoth
rhantegoth.description: "An almost globular torso, with six long, sinuous limbs terminatingin clab-like claws. From the upper end a subsidiary globe bulgedforward bubble-like; its triangle of three staring, fishy eyes,its foot-long and evidently flexible proboscis, and a distendedlateral system analogous to gills, suggested that it was a head."

black_reaver.name: Black reaver
black_reaver.description: A humanoid form, black as night, advancing steadily and unstoppably.Flee!

caine_the_conspirator.name: Caine, the Conspirator
caine_the_conspirator.description: Caine is perhaps the least reliable Amberite, always ready to ignorehis pacts and promises when it suits him. "...the swarthy, dark-eyedcountenance of Caine, dressed all in satin that was black and green,wearing a dark three-cornered hat set at a rakish angle, and a greenplume of feathers trailing down in the back. He was standing in theprofile, one arm akimbo, and toes of his boots curled upwards, and hewore an emerald-studded dagger at his belt... He was dark."

master_quylthulg.name: Master quylthulg
master_quylthulg.description: A pulsating mound of flesh, shining with silver pulses of throbbing light.

greater_draconic_quylthulg.name: Greater draconic quylthulg
greater_draconic_quylthulg.description: A massive mound of scaled flesh, throbbing and pulsating with multi-huedlight.

greater_rotting_quylthulg.name: Greater rotting quylthulg
greater_rotting_quylthulg.description: A massive pile of rotting flesh.  A disgusting stench fills the air as itthrobs and writhes.

null_the_living_void.name: Null the Living Void
null_the_living_void.description: A black hole in the fabric of reality. It simply is not there.

vecna_the_emperor_lich.name: Vecna, the Emperor Lich
vecna_the_emperor_lich.description: He is a highly cunning, extremely magical being, spoken of in legends.His head is rumored to control spells of great power.This ancient shadow of death wilts any living thing it passes.

omarax_the_eye_tyrant.name: Omarax the Eye Tyrant
omarax_the_eye_tyrant.description: A disembodied eye, floating in the air.  His gaze seems to shred yoursoul and his spells crush your will.  He is ancient, his history steepedin forgotten evils, his atrocities numerous and sickening.

tsathoggua_the_sleeper_of_nkai.name: Tsathoggua, the Sleeper of N'kai
tsathoggua_the_sleeper_of_nkai.description: "...the formless bulking of a couchant mass. And the mass stirreda little... and put forth with infinite slothfulness a huge andtoad-shaped head. And the head opened its eyes very slowly, as ifhalf awakened from slumber, so that they were visible as two slitsof oozing phosphor in the black browless face."

gerard_strongman_of_amber.name: Gerard, Strongman of Amber
gerard_strongman_of_amber.description: Gerard may not be quite as devious as the other Amberites, buthe is certainly stronger than the rest of them put together. "...a big,powerful man... (He) resembled (Corwin) quite strongly, save thathis jaw was heavier, and (Corwin) knew he was bigger than him, thoughslower. His strength was a thing out of legend. He wore a dressing gown ofblue and gray clasped around the middle with a wide, black belt, and hestood laughing. About his neck, on a heavy cord, there hung a silverhunting horn. He wore a fringe beard and a light mustache. In his righthand he held a goblet of wine."

ungoliant_the_unlight.name: Ungoliant, the Unlight
ungoliant_the_unlight.description: This enormous, hideous spirit of void is in the form of a spider ofimmense proportions.  She is surrounded by a cloud of Unlight as she sucksin all living light into her bloated body.  She is always ravenouslyhungry and would even eat herself to avoid starvation.  She is rumoured tohave a foul and deadly breath.

atlachnacha_the_spider_god.name: Atlach-Nacha, the Spider God
atlachnacha_the_spider_god.description: "...there was a kind of face on the squat ebon body, low down amidthe several-jointed legs. The face peered up with a weird expressionof doubt and inquiry..."

ygolonac.name: Y'golonac
ygolonac.description: "He saw why the shadow on the frosted pane yesterday had beenheadless and he screamed... but before he could scream out hisprotest his breath was cut off, as the hands descended on hisface and the wed ret mouths opened in their palms."

aether_hound.name: Aether hound
aether_hound.description: A shifting, swirling form.  It seems to be all colours and sizes andshapes, though the dominant form is that of a huge dog.  You feel veryuncertain all of a sudden.

warp_demon.name: Warp demon
warp_demon.description: A huge demon who guards the cross-dimensional gateways.

eric_the_usurper.name: Eric the Usurper
eric_the_usurper.description: When Oberon disappeared, Eric seized the opportunity and claimedthe throne, eliminating those who would have opposed him. "Handsome byanyone's standards, his hair was so dark, as to be almost blue. His beardcurled around the mouth that always smiled, and he was dressed simply in aleather jacket and leggings, a plain cloak, high black boots, and he worea red sword belt bearing a long silvery saber and clasped with a ruby,and his high cloak, collar round his head was lined with red and thetrimmings of his sleeves matched it. His hands, thumbs hooked behindhis belt, were terribly strong and prominent. A pair of black glovesjutted from his belt near his right tip."

yig_father_of_serpents.name: Yig, Father of Serpents
yig_father_of_serpents.description: "The half-human father of serpents... the snake-god of the centralplains tribes -- presumably the primal source of the moresoutherly Quetzalcoatl or Kukulcan -- was odd, half-anthropomorphicdevil."

unmaker.name: Unmaker
unmaker.description: Summoned from the Courts of Chaos, it is a mass of sentient Logrus,spreading uncontrollably and destroying everything in its path.

cyberdemon.name: Cyberdemon
cyberdemon.description: Reverbrant metal steps announce the arrival of this huge creature,half demon half machine. It has an unsurpassable firepower.

hela_queen_of_the_dead.name: Hela, Queen of the Dead
hela_queen_of_the_dead.description: The Norse ruler of Hel is a merciless queen, who ever hunts for moresouls to add to her collection of tortured spirits. She arrives inan ominous green robe, a certain sign of impending doom, to claimas her own those who die an ignoble death.

the_mouth_of_sauron.name: The Mouth of Sauron
the_mouth_of_sauron.description: The Mouth of Sauron is a mighty spell caster.  So old that even he cannotremember his own name, his power and evil are undeniable.  He believesunshakeably that he is unbeatable and laughs as he weaves his awesomespells.

klingsor_evil_master_of_magic.name: Klingsor, Evil Master of Magic
klingsor_evil_master_of_magic.description: Klingsor, whose hopeless effort to join the Knights of the Grailwas thwarted, turned to black magic and became a deadly necromancer.

corwin_lord_of_avalon.name: Corwin, Lord of Avalon
corwin_lord_of_avalon.description: Corwin is one of the most feared and respected Amberites; his skilland cunning are well known. "Green eyes, black hair, dressed in blackand silver, yes. (Corwin) had on a cloak and it was slightly furledas by a wind. (He) had on black boots, like Eric's, and (he) too bore ablade, only (his) was heavier, though not quite as long as (Eric's).(He) had (his) gloves on and they were silver and scaled. The claspat (his) neck was cast in the form of a silver rose."

the_emperor_quylthulg.name: The Emperor Quylthulg
the_emperor_quylthulg.description: A huge seething mass of flesh with a rudimentary intelligence, the EmperorQuylthulg changes colours in front of your eyes.  Pulsating first onecolour then the next, it knows only it must bring help to protect itself.

qlzqqlzuup_the_lord_of_flesh.name: Qlzqqlzuup, the Lord of Flesh
qlzqqlzuup_the_lord_of_flesh.description: This disgusting creature squeals and snorts as it writhes on the floor.It pulsates with evil.  Its intent is to overwhelm you with monster aftermonster, until it can greedily dine on your remains.

cthugha_the_living_flame.name: Cthugha, the Living Flame
cthugha_the_living_flame.description: "But even though we had shielded our eyes, it was impossible notto see the great amorphous shapes streaming skyward from theaccursed place, nor the equally great being hovering like a cloudof living fire above the trees."

benedict_the_ideal_warrior.name: Benedict, the Ideal Warrior
benedict_the_ideal_warrior.description: In the field of combat Benedict rules supreme: with but one handhe was still superior to Corwin. "Benedict, tall and dour; thin ofbody, thin of face, wide of mind. He wore orange and yellow and brownand reminded me of haystacks and pumpkins and scarecrows and theLegend of Sleepy Hollow. He had a long, strong jaw and hazel eyes andbrown hair that never curled. He stood beside a tan horse and leanedupon a lance about which was twined a rope of flowers. He seldomlaughed."

the_witchking_of_angmar.name: The Witch-King of Angmar
the_witchking_of_angmar.description: The Chief of the Ringwraiths.  A fell being of devastating power.  Hisspells are lethal and his combat blows crushingly hard.  He moves atspeed, and commands legions of evil to do his bidding.  It is said that heis fated never to die by the hand of mortal man.

cyaegha.name: Cyaegha
cyaegha.description: "...it was a gigantic eye staring down at them. Around the eye,the sky split; deep clefts opened through which the darknessbegan to ooze, a darkness blacker than the night, which crawleddown as a set of slimy tentacles, taking on more form, moredefinite shape... something was standing, outlined againstthe black sky, something which had tentacles of darknessand a green-glowing eye."

pazuzu_lord_of_air.name: Pazuzu, Lord of Air
pazuzu_lord_of_air.description: A winged humanoid from the Planes of Hell, Pazuzu grins inhumanely at youas he decides your fate.

ithaqua_the_windwalker.name: Ithaqua the Windwalker
ithaqua_the_windwalker.description: The Wendigo, moving so fast that you can see little except twoglowing eyes burning with hatred. "The stars had been blotted out...the great cloud which had obscured the the sky looked curiouslylike the outline of a great man. And... where the top ofthe cloud must have been, where the head of the thing should havebeen, there were two gleaming stars, burning bright -- like eyes!"

hell_hound_of_julian.name: Hell hound of Julian
hell_hound_of_julian.description: It is a giant dog that glows with heat.  Flames pour from its nostrils.

cantoras_the_skeletal_lord.name: Cantoras, the Skeletal Lord
cantoras_the_skeletal_lord.description: A legion of evil undead druj animating the skeleton of a once mightysorcerer.  His power is devastating and his speed unmatched in theunderworld.  Flee his wrath!

mephistopheles_lord_of_hell.name: Mephistopheles, Lord of Hell
mephistopheles_lord_of_hell.description: A duke of hell, in the flesh.

godzilla.name: Godzilla
godzilla.description: Godzilla rose from the contaminated sea.Fear its anger, for its devastation is unmatched!

abhoth_source_of_uncleanness.name: Abhoth, Source of Uncleanness
abhoth_source_of_uncleanness.description: "...in the pool [there was] a grayish, horrid mass that nearly chokedit from rim to rim. Here, it seemed, was the ultimate source of allmiscreation and abomination. For the gray mass quobbed and quivered,and swelled perpetually; and from it, in manifold fission, werespawned the anatomies that crept away on every side through thegrotto."

ymir_the_ice_giant.name: Ymir the Ice Giant
ymir_the_ice_giant.description: Ymir is one of the oldest beings there are. He looks like a gianthumanoid made of ice.

loki_the_trickster.name: Loki the Trickster
loki_the_trickster.description: Loki, the god of mischief, is a nasty person. He will use everydirty trick in the book, and then some. In the end, his half-giantheritage is bound to show, as he will defect to the side of thegiants and fight against the other gods of Asgard.

starspawn_of_cthulhu.name: Star-spawn of Cthulhu
starspawn_of_cthulhu.description: The last remnants of sanity threaten to leave your brain as youbehold this titanic bat-winged, octopus-headed unholy abomination."They all lay in stone houses in their great city of R'lyeh,preserved by the spells of mighty Cthulhu for a gloriousresurrection when the stars and the earth might once morebe ready..."

surtur_the_giant_fire_demon.name: Surtur the Giant Fire Demon
surtur_the_giant_fire_demon.description: Surtur is also one of the most ancient of all creatures. He is a demonicgiant of fire, who is destined to set the nine worlds afire with hisaccursed sword of doom on the day of Ragnarok.

the_tarrasque.name: The Tarrasque
the_tarrasque.description: The Tarrasque is a massive reptile of legend, rumoured to be unkillableand immune to magic.  Fear its anger, for its devastation is unmatched!

lungorthin_the_balrog_of_white_fire.name: Lungorthin, the Balrog of White Fire
lungorthin_the_balrog_of_white_fire.description: A massive form cloaked in flame.  Lungorthin stares balefully at you witheyes that smoulder red.  The dungeon floor where he stands is scorched bythe heat of his body.

draugluin_sire_of_all_werewolves.name: Draugluin, Sire of All Werewolves
draugluin_sire_of_all_werewolves.description: Draugluin provides Sauron with a fearsome personal guard.  He is anenormous wolf inhabited with a human spirit.  He is chief of all his kind.

shumagorath.name: Shuma-Gorath
shumagorath.description: Shuma-Gorath is one of the immortal lords of chaos. The true form ofthis blasphemous horror is a huge, all-seeing eye surrounded by tentacles.

tulzscha_the_green_flame.name: Tulzscha, the Green Flame
tulzscha_the_green_flame.description: "A belching column of sick greenish flame... spouting volcanicallyfrom the depths profound and inconceivable, casting no shadows ashealthy flame should, and coating the nitrous stone with a nasty,venomous verdigris. For all that seething combustion no warmthlay, but only the clamminess of death and corruption."

oremorj_the_cyberdemon_lord.name: Oremorj the Cyberdemon Lord
oremorj_the_cyberdemon_lord.description: The mightiest of Cyberdemons, their lord and ruler.

kaschei_the_immortal.name: Kaschei the Immortal
kaschei_the_immortal.description: A stench of corruption and decay surrounds this sorcerer, who has clearlyrisen from the grave to continue his foul plots and schemes.

yogsothoth_the_allinone.name: Yog-Sothoth, the All-in-One
yogsothoth_the_allinone.description: "Great globes of light massing towards the opening... the breakingapart of the nearest globes, and the protoplasmic flesh thatflowed blackly outward to join together and form that eldritch,hideous horror from outer space... whose mask was a congeriesof iridescent globes... who froths as primal slime in nuclearchaos forever beyond the nethermost outposts of space and time!"

fenris_wolf.name: Fenris Wolf
fenris_wolf.description: The immensely huge wolf who would swallow the sun to satisfy itshunger and leave the Norse gods for the dessert.

great_wyrm_of_power.name: Great Wyrm of Power
great_wyrm_of_power.description: The mightiest of all dragonkind, a great wyrm of power is seldomencountered in our world. It can crush stars with its might.

shubniggurath_black_goat_of_the_woods.name: Shub-Niggurath, Black Goat of the Woods
shubniggurath_black_goat_of_the_woods.description: This horrendous outer god looks like a writhing cloudy mass filledwith mouths and tentacles.

nodens_lord_of_the_great_abyss.name: Nodens, Lord of the Great Abyss
nodens_lord_of_the_great_abyss.description: The hoary Lord of the Great Abyss seems a wizened man, but appearancescan be deceiving.

carcharoth_the_jaws_of_thirst.name: Carcharoth, the Jaws of Thirst
carcharoth_the_jaws_of_thirst.description: The first guard of Angband, Carcharoth, also known as 'The Red Maw', isthe largest wolf to ever walk the earth.  He is highly intelligent and adeadly opponent in combat.

nyarlathotep_the_crawling_chaos.name: Nyarlathotep, the Crawling Chaos
nyarlathotep_the_crawling_chaos.description: Nyarlathothep is the messenger, the heart and the soul of the outer gods.He is a shapechanger capable of assuming thousands of nightmarish forms.One of them looks like this: "A tall, slim figure with the young face ofan antique pharaoh, gay with prismatic robes and crowned with apshent that glowed with inherent light... the fascination of adark god or fallen archangel, and around whose eyes there lurkedthe languid sparkle of capricious humor."

azathoth_seething_nuclear_chaos.name: Azathoth, Seething Nuclear Chaos
azathoth_seething_nuclear_chaos.description: "That last amorphous blight of nethermost confusion whichblasphemes and bubbles at the centre of all infinity --the boundless daemon sultan Azathoth, whose name no lipsdare speak aloud, and who gnaws hungrily in inconceivable,unlighted chambers beyond time amidst the muffled, maddeningbeating of vile drums and the thin monotonous whine ofaccursed flutes."

cerberus_guardian_of_hades.name: Cerberus, Guardian of Hades
cerberus_guardian_of_hades.description: A three-headed hell hound of fearsome aspect.  Flame burns merrily from itshide as it snarls and roars its defiance.

jormungand_the_midgard_serpent.name: Jormungand the Midgard Serpent
jormungand_the_midgard_serpent.description: The Midgard Serpent is so huge that its body surrounds the world ofmortal men. It can grind gods themselves to lifeless pulp.

the_destroyer.name: The Destroyer
the_destroyer.description: The Destroyer was built by the Norse deities to be their ultimate weaponagainst the space gods who had arrived to judge the world. Unfortunately,the Destroyer has gone berserk and is destroying everything it sees. Themystical Destroyer is nearly indestructible, and it is said that when ituses its power of complete disintegration, the day of Ragnarok is near.

gothmog_the_high_captain_of_balrogs.name: Gothmog, the High Captain of Balrogs
gothmog_the_high_captain_of_balrogs.description: Gothmog is the Chief Balrog in Morgoth's personal guard.  He is renownedfor slaying Ecthelion the Warder of the Gates and he has never beendefeated in combat.  With his whip of flame and awesome fiery breath hesaved his master from Ungoliant's rage.

great_cthulhu.name: Great Cthulhu
great_cthulhu.description: This creature is death incarnate. "A monster of vaguely anthropoidoutline, but with an octopus-like head whose face was a mass offeelers, a scaly, rubbery-looking body, prodigious claws on hindfore feet, and long, narrow wings behind. This thing... was asomewhat bloated corpulence... It lumbered slobberingly into sightand gropingly squeezed its gelatinous green immensity through theblack doorway... A mountain shambled or walked."

sauron_the_sorcerer.name: Sauron, the Sorcerer
sauron_the_sorcerer.description: Mighty in spells and enchantments,he created the One Ring.  His eyes glow with power and his gaze seeks todestroy your soul.  He has many servants, and rarely fights without them.

the_unicorn_of_order.name: The Unicorn of Order
the_unicorn_of_order.description: The Unicorn of Order, who once stole an eye from the great Serpentof chaos, is watching the events unfold with growing distress. Itregards you as a mortal meddling in the affairs of immortals, andattempts to eliminate you.

oberon_king_of_amber.name: Oberon, King of Amber
oberon_king_of_amber.description: Oberon, the father or grandfather of most Amberites, is as powerfulas ever. He is afraid that you will upset the balance and will notlet you harm the Serpent of Chaos. "Oberon, Lord of Amber, stood beforeme in his green and his gold. High, wide and thick, his beard black andshot with silver, his hair the same. Green rings in gold settings anda blade of golden color."

morgoth_lord_of_darkness.name: Morgoth, Lord of Darkness
morgoth_lord_of_darkness.description: He is the Master of the Pits of Angband.  His figure is like a blackmountain crowned with Lightning.  He rages with everlasting anger, hisbody scarred by Fingolfin's eight mighty wounds.  He can never rest fromhis pain, but seeks forever to dominate all that is light and good in theworld.  He is the origin of man's fear of darkness and created many foulcreatures with his evil powers.  Orcs, Dragons, and Trolls are his mostfoul corruptions, causing much pain and suffering in the world to pleasehim.  His disgusting visage, twisted with evil, is crowned with iron, thetwo remaining Silmarils forever burning him.  Grond, the mighty Hammer ofthe Underworld, cries defiance as he strides towards you to crush you to apulp!

the_serpent_of_chaos.name: The Serpent of Chaos
the_serpent_of_chaos.description: The Big Boss himself. Before the universe the Serpent was. The Unicornof Order fought with Serpent and stole one of its eyes, known as theJewel of Judgement. With the Jewel, Dworkin drew the Pattern and thusgave birth to the infinite worlds of shadow. Now the balance has beendisrupted, the Pattern damaged, and all the shadow is being absorbed bythe Serpent. Unless it is stopped, the word as we know it will come toan end, all order reverting to Primal Chaos.

quantum_dot.name: Quantum dot
quantum_dot.description: It is there and it is not.

a_plain_gold_ring.name: a Plain Gold Ring
a_plain_gold_ring.description: It is a ring of immense power.  You can hardly believe you'vefinally found the One Ring!

lourph.name: Lourph
lourph.description: Small brown spiders that lurk in the darkness deep underground.  An individual would be nearly harmless, but their size allows many to crawl where only a single Mirkwood spider could stand.  Packs of these arachnids may scour the depths untiringly, and their hunger is never satisfied.

caaws.name: Caaws
caaws.description: A thing like a massive, jet black oyster with four groping tendrils.  Born of nether, it need not chase its prey, content to seeth in the darkness until some unfortunate creature wanders too close.

culverin.name: Culverin
culverin.description: A many legged scuttling thing, it spits pebbles with deadly force.

behinder.name: Behinder
behinder.description: "The Behinder flung itself on his shoulders. Then I knew why nobody's supposed to see one. I wish I hadn't. To this day I can see it, plain as a fence at noon, and forever I will be able to see it."

boadile.name: Boadile
boadile.description: "...Head something like a croc's, only bigger. Around forty feet long. Able to roll itself into a big beachball with teeth.  Fast on land or in water - and a hell of a lot of little legs on each side."

ebony_monk.name: Ebony monk
ebony_monk.description: A monk in dusky robes trained in the most lethal martial arts.

unstable_worm_mass.name: Unstable worm mass
unstable_worm_mass.description: A seething mass of thick, glowing worms.

automobile.name: Auto-mobile
automobile.description: It is a streamlined metal demon, moving under its own power to crush you.  It rumbles hungrily.

shallow_puddle.name: Shallow puddle
shallow_puddle.description: It is a placid watery pool.

deep_puddle.name: Deep puddle
deep_puddle.description: It is a large, rippling watery pool.

noxious_fume.name: Noxious fume
noxious_fume.description: It is a swirling cloud of yellowish gas.

pattern_vortex.name: Pattern vortex
pattern_vortex.description: A swirling, rotating red disk.  A funnel thrusts out, seeking the one who disturbed the Pattern.

storm_troll.name: Storm Troll
storm_troll.description: The dungeon shakes as an enormous troll-form thunders into view, hurlingice and lightning in every direction.  It is thirty feet tall, has sixheads, and is enraged at your impudence.

bat_of_gorgoroth.name: Bat of Gorgoroth
bat_of_gorgoroth.description: Fed with horrid meats and grown to enormous size, this slavering creatureseeks livelier prey.

spectral_wyrm.name: Spectral Wyrm
spectral_wyrm.description: The tortured soul of a once powerful wyrm.

creeping_dust.name: Creeping dust
creeping_dust.description: This is what happens to a mage when a powerful spell fails.

dark_elven_shade.name: Dark elven shade
dark_elven_shade.description: A dark elven figure that glows with an inner light.

antimagic_hound.name: Anti-magic hound
antimagic_hound.description: A field of static energy surrounds this hound. Its presence seemsto dampen all other energies...

mana_hound.name: Mana hound
mana_hound.description: A powerful aura radiates from this canine creature. It feelslike... magic?

vore.name: Vore
vore.description: A gaunt, vaguely humanoid torso merged with the form of a giantspider, ugly as sin. It screams horribly as it charges at you.

giant_silver_ant.name: Giant silver ant
giant_silver_ant.description: This ant shines strangely, as if made out of metal.

bakeneko.name: Bakeneko
bakeneko.description: A feline surrounded by a strange energy.

iridescent_worm_mass.name: Iridescent worm mass
iridescent_worm_mass.description: This mass of worms seems to shimmer with strange power.

giant_time_fly.name: Giant time fly
giant_time_fly.description: It wasn't there a second ago....

sheep.name: Sheep
sheep.description: Awww, look at the sheep isn't it cute...

warp_drake.name: Warp drake
warp_drake.description: A vaguely dragon-shaped distortion in the ether; it shimmerslike a heat haze as you study it carefully.

great_dimensional_wyrm.name: Great Dimensional Wyrm
great_dimensional_wyrm.description: This immense, vaguely dragon-shaped distortion in the ether hasmastered the magics of both space and time.
